Author: desaart
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: Excuse me. Are you talking about Alfa Bank? They have the sixth place in the Russian rating. From January to March lost $ 1.6 billion in assets. Very good partner (no). Let's take a look at its rating: (ACRA: AA, Expert RA: ruAA) these are Russian "rating agencies"; we look at normal agencies (Fitch Ratings: BB +, Standard & Poor`s: BB +, Moody`s: Ba2). And what does this "bank" offer as a partner? We look: "When you open an account for a business, you are charged Buzkoin amount of charges depends on the tariff." This "advantageous" offer (no) is exclusively for Russian entrepreneurs. Oh, stop... There is even a phone number, but this is a regular mobile number, which is not related to the bank (I admit that some employee decided to earn extra money on outsourcing). ---- Bank Otkritie (Tochka Bank): They have 8th place in the Russian rating. Over the same period, they are up by $ 7.5 billion. Almost no information from rating agencies (ACRA: A+; Expert RA: ruAA-), Moody`s: Ba1. And the same offer as above. ---- Perhaps the banks are good, but the offer is absolutely useless.

Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: The fact that Buzcoin offers you the creation of a platform that will be outshine such giants as Amazon, Youtube, etc. - Do not you worry that Buzcoin in the team does not have a single specialist with a world-wide name who would be able to create this? In addition, the above youtube and Amazon is the result of many years of work of tens of thousands of people, and investing tens of millions of dollars. But Buzcoin having only 10 people, hopes to create a giant that will surpass the old-timers of the market who have already earned the trust and love of people? Agree, this is stupid. Think about the technical component of the project. This is unrealizable, and Buzcoin deceives you. They can not create this platform with the investments that they received. 200k dollars it was, while the ETH cost more. Now they have no more than 70k dollars. If you not believe in me and all those people who tried to open your eyes here, then study the project carefully, and after that come to the telegram chats. Ask administrators questions and do not agree to wait for the team's official statement. There will be no official statement. Complete telegrams are full of anarchy. The previous administration team stopped responding. We were told that now a new team will work. But her representative is a rude, ill-bred fool who does not just not answer people's questions - he's still rude to them in return. Requires people to send him photos of documents to prove to him that they are investors. And all this after you and I went through KYC. Buzcoin team does not have the proper professional level, it does not have a lot of technical experts. Olga Buzova in every possible way eschews this project. Look at its instagtram. Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: Here is more information for you. Questions to which the team did not respond.  1. How will the social network of this project be competitively better than those already available on Facebook or facebook? Explain so that even if not an average fan of creativity Buzovoy, a person would want to say: "I want this social network instead of in contact!".  2. Than the messenger of this project will be competitively better than the already available vysap or telegram or vibe? Or at least why should we use it when there are already the aforementioned giants (to do better, nobody has ever succeeded, although there are a couple of dozen companies with a capitalization of more than half a million and the top programmers - examples of WeChat, KIN, etc.).  3. Why would the project do something similar to video hosting when there is already YouTube? Everyone knows the vain attempts of all Vimeo and Rutuba to take a share of this niche in the market of multimedia content.  4. Why do a service to find a job, when there is already a headhunter, gobro, etc. (in which tens of millions of dollars are invested in development and marketing, and they are worth this money.) And do you want to make your competitor $ 200,000?)  5. On the main page of the site it is written that Olga invited to the project "real professionals who have already worked in the field of blockbuster." I ask you to name the names of these professionals, and links to their Linked-In (without water and empty talk please.) We will check these people to operate on facts.)  6. The question of the distribution of money after fees. A capa of 210 million is declared (let's not talk about it, people who establish this amount are obviously divorced from reality, or were under the influence of coca leaves when they compiled a kapa if they believed that they would be given at least 1% of this amount). Let's talk about what is written on the site. 33% of the fees go to equipment. From 210 million 33% is 69 million dollars. I would like to hear WHAT you want to buy for such money if (theoretically) collect a hardcup? Even if you hypothetically assemble IN 10 TIMES LESS than Archie's Wishlist claims, what will you buy for $ 7 million? WHAT? Only, please, without water. We are all pretty well oriented in the prices of equipment in the field of IT.  7. Now go to the road map. If you believe the plans, by the third quarter of 2019, the marketplace, messenger, p2r platform, and video hosting will already be made. For such a volume of work in such a short time, you will need a staff of (NOT LESS) hundreds of professional programmers and designers. And we return to the frames. Show us this state. At least 10 people show out of the hundreds that will be needed. Or show job opportunities for jobs where you are looking for them.  8. After the producer Olga, who is a professional in the show business, but has never been seen in the IT sphere and the blockbuster, a certain Sergei Semin comes next. All that we know about him, he keeps a network of cafes and canteens with an authorized capital of 10 thousand rubles (WOW!). This experience will certainly help him effectively in half a year to kill YouTube and telegrams and facebook for the collected 200k (still a big question whether they are collected, we will return to this below). What for in such project the shopkeeper meal?  9. Some director of investment Alexey Novikov. What kind of investments is he a director? Show us his work. His link-in, or at least a document, where his name and the amount of investments are marked. And then on the site just a name, just a photo of a man, and just a phrase "director of investment." I can also write in my contact that I am the Minister of Economy of one of the developing countries of Asia. The level of trust will be comparable.  10. Next we see that the team has three Whitperpe creators. For the first time I see that the project was hanging on a site not by the creators of the beta version, or MVP, but by the writer and the Whitpeper artist. Why do investors need this? Whitepper has nothing to do with the product, which will bring dividends to investors. Show programmers. This concludes the team. Magnificent seven and a lawyer consult that will kill the top multimedia giants of the entire Internet.  11. Well, to the fees. Show wallets, where the real money is already collected. You broke into the world of crypt, where it is accepted that the blockade is transparency. And you hide your wallets yourself. It's obvious to everyone that you are hiding this because the fees are catastrophically ridiculous and useless. And to prove it back without water you can only show us real wallets, where transactions from real users are visible.  12. The githab is empty. At what stage of development?   13. Where is the promised for the start of MVP sales?   14. Why does Olga advertise anything except her own token?  15. Fans of Olga are indifferent to crypto-currencies and they do not try to use them. You can not get from them even the investments you need.  16. Idea of delirium. It is of no interest to anyone.  17. The need for a blockade is overstated. He does not need this project.  18. Your scam only disgraces the domestic ICO industry.  19. If you want to create an application, then apply for investments to funds. Crypto-currency investors will not give you money.

Body: 40% of Millennials own cryptocurrencies  CreditCoin.com conducted a study on the attitude to cryptocurrencies, the main idea of which was that the most important obstacle to the acquisition of cryptocurrencies is ignorance of how to do it, coupled with difficulties in investing in cryptocurrencies.  It is interesting that for a generation of Millennials, that is, people between the ages of 18 and 37, it is very important that new people with whom they want to have a relationship know something about cryptocurrencies.  This was stated by 75% of respondents representing this age group.  At the same time, only 12% of respondents would agree to reunite their lives with a person who has invested all their savings in cryptocurrency -this shows that the growth of interest in cryptocurrencies is of professional nature, that is, people in the majority of them are responsible for such investment, rightly believing that it is not necessary to "put eggs in one basket".   https://buzcoin.io/   Source:  https://www.facebook.com/366805253813711/photos/a.369655846861985/429213574239545/?type=3&theater

This is what determines the fact that cryptocurrencies are a " real alternative "to existing currencies," they demonstrate that there is more confidence in them over time."  Oganyan said that the blockchain will replace the Internet: "if events develop as we assume, there is a possibility of a new Internet, which will be created "on top of the existing infrastructure". Author: voltesbit777
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: Scotland intends to introduce blockchain in five steps  Scottish authorities have announced a plan to implement the transition to a distributed register of public authorities, as well as its implementation in all spheres of society.  In accordance with the developed strategy, five steps will be taken.  First, a working Commission is being convened, which will consist of representatives of business, officials, as well as experts in the field of new financial technologies.  Second, a database of ready-made examples of how to use blockchain is created.  Third, it establishes contact with countries whose authorities are actively implementing blockchain, in particular, with the Netherlands and Malta.  Fourth, through existing government programs and projects in Scotland, focused on new technologies, the introduction of blockchain will begin, which will be supported by resources from the budget.  Fifth, the working group will be further transformed into a Commission on the strategy of using blockchain to solve the strategic tasks of Scotland.  Scottish authorities are confident in the great potential of the blockchain!  🖥 https://buzcoin.io/   Source:  https://www.facebook.com/366805253813711/photos/a.369655846861985/432313570596212/?type=3&theater

Author: voltesbit777
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: In most African countries cryptocurrencies are allowed  EcoBank, based in Togo, published a study about the attitude of the authorities of various African countries to cryptocurrencies.  The main conclusion is that almost everywhere on the African continent, with the exception of Namibia, there is a ban not only on the purchase and sale of cryptocurrencies, but also on their use as an alternative means of payment.  In Nigeria, the most populous country in Africa, cryptocurrencies are not only allowed, but their circulation is regulated and taxes are collected from such operations.  A similar situation with the regulation develops in South Africa and Swaziland: here the authorities strongly encourage the development of cryptocurrency business.  In other countries, the government authorities take a wait-and-see position, without interfering with the development of the cryptocurrency market.  As a result, 36 countries of the continent have recently recorded an increase in purchases of crypto-coins.  🖥 https://buzcoin.io/   Source: https://www.facebook.com/366805253813711/photos/a.369655846861985/441249153035987/?type=3&theater

Author: voltesbit777
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: The real gold market lost on turnover of transactions with Bitcoins  According to the statistics of the London gold market, through the five largest clearing companies that are engaged in servicing transactions with the physical volume of this precious metal, since the beginning of the year, the turnover of transactions in this area amounted to 446 billion dollars.  These companies account for about 70% of the world's gold turnover, which means that the global volume of transactions amounted to 637 billion dollars.  At the same time, the total volume of transactions with Bitcoin for the same period reached 848 billion dollars, which suggests that investors' interest in real, over-the-counter transactions with gold is much inferior to their desire to trade cryptocurrency.  By the end of the year, it is expected that the volume of Bitcoin transactions will be at least 1.38 trillion dollars.  🖥 https://buzcoin.io/   Sources:  https://www.facebook.com/366805253813711/photos/a.369655846861985/445254779302091/?type=3&theater

Body: The head of Coinbase: in 3-5 years the crisis erupts and interest in cryptocurrencies will grow sharply  Brian Armstrong, the head of the most popular crypto-exchange in the US, Coinbase, shared his vision of the prospects of cryptocurrencies. In his opinion, in fact, it could take many years before cryptocurrencies become the same common means of payment as, for example, the US dollar in the US economy and world trade. However, the situation will change much faster: according to Armstrong, in 3-5 years the world expects a huge economic crisis that will reshape the entire modern financial system, and interest in cryptocurrencies will grow significantly.  Currently, about 10% of cryptocurrencies actively perform the functions of money, but in a few years they will be the majority. After the global economic crisis will happen, most payments for goods and services will be made using smartphones and cryptocurrency.  🖥 https://buzcoin.io/   source:  https://www.facebook.com/366805253813711/photos/a.369655846861985/445835642577338/?type=3&theater

Body: The head of Coinbase: in 3-5 years the crisis erupts and interest in cryptocurrencies will grow sharply  Brian Armstrong, the head of the most popular crypto-exchange in the US, Coinbase, shared his vision of the prospects of cryptocurrencies. In his opinion, in fact, it could take many years before cryptocurrencies become the same common means of payment as, for example, the US dollar in the US economy and world trade. However, the situation will change much faster: according to Armstrong, in 3-5 years the world expects a huge economic crisis that will reshape the entire modern financial system, and interest in cryptocurrencies will grow significantly.  Currently, about 10% of cryptocurrencies actively perform the functions of money, but in a few years they will be the majority. After the global economic crisis will happen, most payments for goods and services will be made using smartphones and cryptocurrency. https://c.radikal.ru/c20/1808/7d/fbd16a2d9e96.jpg

Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: The real gold market lost on turnover of transactions with Bitcoins  According to the statistics of the London gold market, through the five largest clearing companies that are engaged in servicing transactions with the physical volume of this precious metal, since the beginning of the year, the turnover of transactions in this area amounted to 446 billion dollars.  These companies account for about 70% of the world's gold turnover, which means that the global volume of transactions amounted to 637 billion dollars.  At the same time, the total volume of transactions with Bitcoin for the same period reached 848 billion dollars, which suggests that investors' interest in real, over-the-counter transactions with gold is much inferior to their desire to trade cryptocurrency.  By the end of the year, it is expected that the volume of Bitcoin transactions will be at least 1.38 trillion dollars.  https://buzcoin.io  https://s7.wampi.ru/2018/08/24/069eb41312b5e25726.md.jpg

Body: Facebook wants to bring its billions with the help of the blockchain  ▫️The social network Facebook, which capitalization at the end of July collapsed in one day by 119 billion dollars, is looking for ways to return the shaken confidence of investors.  ▫️The ban on cryptocurrency advertising, which was introduced at the beginning of the year, was not appreciated by the market, as well as the fact that Facebook still has not made a step into the crypto world.  ▫️However, the situation is changing: after 8 months as a part of the Board of the American crypto-exchange Coinbase, David Marcus, the chief of blockchain research in Facebook, decided to leave the trading platform, explaining this by "a conflict of interest".  ▫️Thus, the study of the blockchain in Facebook is clearly moving into a practical plane, and to a large extent this is due to the depressing behavior of the shares of companies: the management of the social network is trying to understand how to return the billions of lost capitalization, starting practical application of the blockchain technology, which has already allowed many companies in the world to achieve significant progress, especially in the eyes of investors.  ▫️Meanwhile, in addition to the fact that the market began to discuss what kind of blockchain project Facebook will finally show the world (perhaps the opportunity to buy cryptocurrencies through its own digital wallet or launch its own platform for trading crypto-coins), there was talk that, perhaps, the social network is now trying to grab any straw to stay afloat, since it is possible that new technologies will lead to a fundamental restructuring of the social media market.  🖥 https://buzcoin.io/   Source: https://www.facebook.com/366805253813711/photos/a.369655846861985/437093333451569/?type=3&theater

Body: 35 million Mexicans bought cryptocurrency  The largest platform for trading cryptocurrencies in Mexico, Bitso, together with a number of partner companies in the field of cryptocurrencies conducted a study on the degree of penetration of cryptocurrencies into the economic life of this Latin American country.  It became known that 35 million Mexicans bought cryptocurrency and used it in payments for goods and services.  At the same time, a third of them are long-term holders of cryptocurrencies, who are planning to use them in old age as pension savings.  To a large extent, such savings are made using digital wallets installed in the form of applications on smartphones (40.8%).  Only less than a third of Mexicans are worried about large fluctuations in prices for cryptocurrencies.  The most recognizable cryptocurrencies are Bitcoin (61.2%), Bitcoin cash (38.8%), Litecoin (16%), Ether (15.5%) and Ripple (12.8%).  https://buzcoin.io  https://s7.wampi.ru/2018/08/24/000005.md.jpg

Body: Tom Lee: the proliferation of cryptocurrencies comes with triple speed  The founder and the head of the research company Fundstrat Global Advisors Tom Lee shared at the conference on cryptocurrencies and blockchain, held in the capital of Thailand, in Bangkok, his opinion on what is happening in the cryptocurrency market.  He does not refuse the forecast that in the next four and a half months the cryptocurrency market expects a powerful upward movement.  Tom Lee is confident in this, since he believes that the spread of cryptocurrencies occurs at a tripled rate — the way that the market has done over the past 9 years, since the appearance of Bitcoin, according to his estimates, corresponds to about 30 years of development of traditional financial markets.  Meanwhile, he expects that the pace of development of the cryptocurrency world will increase, and the biggest growth point will be the sphere of tokenization of traditional assets-from stocks and bonds to gold and real estate.  https://buzcoin.io  https://s7.wampi.ru/2018/08/22/000004.md.jpg

Author: buzcoin.io
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: In most African countries cryptocurrencies are allowed  EcoBank, based in Togo, published a study about the attitude of the authorities of various African countries to cryptocurrencies.  The main conclusion is that almost everywhere on the African continent, with the exception of Namibia, there is a ban not only on the purchase and sale of cryptocurrencies, but also on their use as an alternative means of payment.  In Nigeria, the most populous country in Africa, cryptocurrencies are not only allowed, but their circulation is regulated and taxes are collected from such operations.  A similar situation with the regulation develops in South Africa and Swaziland: here the authorities strongly encourage the development of cryptocurrency business.  In other countries, the government authorities take a wait-and-see position, without interfering with the development of the cryptocurrency market.  As a result, 36 countries of the continent have recently recorded an increase in purchases of crypto-coins.  https://buzcoin.io  https://s7.wampi.ru/2018/08/21/004.md.jpg

Author: buzcoin.io
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: Chinese authorities intend to introduce blockchain at an accelerated pace  The Ministry of industry and information technology of China (MIIT) is considering options for changing Beijing's policy towards accelerating the transition of business processes to blockchain, as reported by local state media.  This intention, firstly, once again proves Beijing's great interest in the technology of the distributed register-earlier it became known that the authorities of the country registered 41 patents for inventions that are associated with the blockchain and the creation of a single cryptocurrency wallet for charging duties and fees in the provision of public services to the population and business.  Secondly, the accelerated implementation of the blockchain means that Beijing has become aware that further delay in this issue will have a negative impact on the competitiveness of the Chinese economy, which is of particular importance in the situation of a large-scale "trade war" with the United States.  MIIT sees the transfer to the blockchain of the financial sector of the country as a priority, including the provision of services for remote access of Bank customers to their accounts.  In addition, blockchain should be implemented at an accelerated pace in logistics and the Internet of things (IoT).  For the implementation of their plans MIIT reportedly begins to create a public blockchain ecosystem that will enable companies to obtain support from the authorities during their transition to the business processes using the technology of the distributed registry.  https://buzcoin.io  https://s7.wampi.ru/2018/08/18/0000002544105372bdf1117.md.jpg

Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: Facebook wants to bring its billions with the help of the blockchain  The social network Facebook, which capitalization at the end of July collapsed in one day by 119 billion dollars, is looking for ways to return the shaken confidence of investors.  The ban on cryptocurrency advertising, which was introduced at the beginning of the year, was not appreciated by the market, as well as the fact that Facebook still has not made a step into the crypto world.  However, the situation is changing: after 8 months as a part of the Board of the American crypto-exchange Coinbase, David Marcus, the chief of blockchain research in Facebook, decided to leave the trading platform, explaining this by "a conflict of interest".  Thus, the study of the blockchain in Facebook is clearly moving into a practical plane, and to a large extent this is due to the depressing behavior of the shares of companies: the management of the social network is trying to understand how to return the billions of lost capitalization, starting practical application of the blockchain technology, which has already allowed many companies in the world to achieve significant progress, especially in the eyes of investors.  Meanwhile, in addition to the fact that the market began to discuss what kind of blockchain project Facebook will finally show the world (perhaps the opportunity to buy cryptocurrencies through its own digital wallet or launch its own platform for trading crypto-coins), there was talk that, perhaps, the social network is now trying to grab any straw to stay afloat, since it is possible that new technologies will lead to a fundamental restructuring of the social media market.  https://buzcoin.io  https://s7.wampi.ru/2018/08/17/0002f48aa35737cab2ec.md.jpg

Body: Analysts: ICO attract more and more funds  ▪️ Researchers from the independent rating agencies ICORating published the results of a market analysis of primary offering amount of cryptocoins.  ▫️Statistical calculations prove that the ICO remains popular among investors, as well as an effective way to attract financing.  ▫️According to the agency, since the beginning of the year, investors have invested $ 11 billion in various ICOs, which is ten times more than in the same period last year.  ▫️In the second quarter of this year, 827 projects were able to provide themselves with funding for 8 billion dollars compared to 3.3 billion dollars, which were received during the ICO for the first three months of this year.  ▫️Thus, the ICO showed a quarterly growth of attracted investments by 151%.  ▪️ According ICORating Europe became the leader in number of made ICO: in the Old world started 46% of all projects.  ▫️ North America (USA and Canada) became the most generous in terms of attracted funds: 64.67% of all investors ' money that came to the global ICO market came to projects that were launched in this region.  ▫️Asian countries showed a mixed dynamics: the number of ICO conducted here decreased by 40%, but the volume of attracted funds increased by 20%.  https://buzcoin.io  https://s7.wampi.ru/2018/08/16/0000001.md.jpg

Body: Michael Arrington: 40% of the middle class in South Korea own cryptocurrencies  A well-known researcher of new technologies and attitudes among the public, Michael Arrington, said during his visit to South Korea that according to his data, 40% of the middle class of South Korea have already acquired cryptocurrencies, which is a record country indicator.  Thus, he made it clear that he is skeptical about the methodology of other studies that show less interest in cryptocurrencies in this country, since it is very important for him to understand how the question is raised.  Thus, the South Korean financial group KB Financial Group Inc published a report according to which only 2% of the population of this country intend to invest in these cryptocurrencies in the future.  According to the results of the survey of 1000 people, the organization received the following results: 74.8% of respondents did not want to invest in cryptocurrencies, and 23% said that their decision will "depend on the situation."  By the way, the greatest interest in cryptocurrency activities in the region Michael Arrington noted in South Korea and China, even despite the fact that Beijing has a restrictive policy regarding the trade in crypto-currencies.  https://buzcoin.io  https://s7.wampi.ru/2018/08/15/0001.md.jpg

Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: Scotland intends to introduce blockchain in five steps  Scottish authorities have announced a plan to implement the transition to a distributed register of public authorities, as well as its implementation in all spheres of society.  In accordance with the developed strategy, five steps will be taken.  First, a working Commission is being convened, which will consist of representatives of business, officials, as well as experts in the field of new financial technologies.  Second, a database of ready-made examples of how to use blockchain is created.  Third, it establishes contact with countries whose authorities are actively implementing blockchain, in particular, with the Netherlands and Malta.  Fourth, through existing government programs and projects in Scotland, focused on new technologies, the introduction of blockchain will begin, which will be supported by resources from the budget.  Fifth, the working group will be further transformed into a Commission on the strategy of using blockchain to solve the strategic tasks of Scotland.  Scottish authorities are confident in the great potential of the blockchain!  https://buzcoin.io  https://s7.wampi.ru/2018/08/12/492c81669c832dbb0c.md.jpg

Author: buzcoin.io
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: Every third person dreams about the salary in cryptocurrency  The survey, which was conducted using the Google Survey sociological panel, and was organized by the British company Sage, showed that 31% of respondents "would be happy" if most of their salaries were in cryptocurrencies, and 15% said they would be happy to see all their income in the form of cryptocurrency.  One thousand people took part in the survey, of which 37% concretized their attitude to cryptocurrencies in such a way that they are ready to receive a small part of the salary in cryptocurrency "for the sake of experiment", but not more than 20% of their total income.  11% of respondents said that they are ready to accept cryptocurrency as payment for their work, but in the range of 61 to 80%, as they are not ready to completely abandon the usual money.  It has also turned out that women are less likely to get paid in cryptocurrencies — those were only 25%, while 75% of men said that they are open to such an opportunity.  At the same time, if we consider that 90% of all Bitcoins are owned by men, we can say that changes towards greater involvement of women in the crypto world are becoming a trend.  According to the age dimension, people from 25 to 34 years show the most desire to receive a salary in cryptocurrency -those in this group are 33%.  Great interest in such a proposal remains at the age of 35 to 44 years, but in older group there is a sharp drop in the desire to receive any salary payments in the form of cryptocurrencies.  https://buzcoin.io  https://s7.wampi.ru/2018/08/09/414f301bce0ffaaff1.md.jpg

Author: buzcoin.io
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: CreditCoin.com: 40% of Millennials own cryptocurrencies  CreditCoin.com conducted a study on the attitude to cryptocurrencies, the main idea of which was that the most important obstacle to the acquisition of cryptocurrencies is ignorance of how to do it, coupled with difficulties in investing in cryptocurrencies.  It is interesting that for a generation of Millennials, that is, people between the ages of 18 and 37, it is very important that new people with whom they want to have a relationship know something about cryptocurrencies.  This was stated by 75% of respondents representing this age group.  At the same time, only 12% of respondents would agree to reunite their lives with a person who has invested all their savings in cryptocurrency -this shows that the growth of interest in cryptocurrencies is of professional nature, that is, people in the majority of them are responsible for such investment, rightly believing that it is not necessary to "put eggs in one basket".  It is noteworthy that the survey showed a very significant percentage of those Millennials that own cryptocurrencies — those were 40%.  From this age category, almost every second man owns cryptocurrency (48%), and among women — every fourth (26%).  However, all this does not mean that the owners of cryptocurrencies do not carry out transactions with them in pairs with ordinary money: every tenth respondent who solved his housing problem, said that he sold some of his cryptocurrency to pay an initial mortgage loan fee.  https://buzcoin.io  https://s7.wampi.ru/2018/08/09/42170a492f4df0dd10.md.jpg

Body: The largest network of cinemas in Thailand switched to cryptocurrencies  After the authorities of Thailand met a halfway with the cryptocurrency business and adopted the relevant legislation, the country started developing i this direction. Thus, the largest network of cinemas Major Cineplex allowed visitors to make payments in cryptocurrencies. This initiative will be developed in partnership with the Swiss payment company Rapidzpay.  Currently, there are 143 cinemas in Thailand, which are part of this network, including the largest in the country — Paragon Cineplex, which operates in the capital, Bangkok. Major Cineplex also has its own cinemas in Cambodia and Laos, and the company intends to monitor the development of legislation in these countries to take advantage of the Thai experience. In general, the company has 678 halls for the screening of films, and its plans include increasing their number to one thousand.  It is interesting that the development of such business will contribute to the further spread of cryptocurrencies, that is, there is an obvious positive synergistic effect. It is expected that initially as a means of payment will be accepted Bitcoins, Bitcoin Cash and Litecoin. Thai authorities strongly encourage the use of cryptocurrencies as means of payment. Officially recognized cryptocurrency are Bitcoins, Ethereum, Bitkon Cache, Ethereum classic, Litecoin, Ripple and Lumens.  🖥 https://buzcoin.io/   Sources: https://www.facebook.com/366805253813711/photos/a.369655846861985.1073741828.366805253813711/426850867809149/?type=3&theater

Author: buzcoin.io
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: The largest network of cinemas in Thailand switched to cryptocurrencies  After the authorities of Thailand met a halfway with the cryptocurrency business and adopted the relevant legislation, the country started developing i this direction. Thus, the largest network of cinemas Major Cineplex allowed visitors to make payments in cryptocurrencies. This initiative will be developed in partnership with the Swiss payment company Rapidzpay.  Currently, there are 143 cinemas in Thailand, which are part of this network, including the largest in the country — Paragon Cineplex, which operates in the capital, Bangkok. Major Cineplex also has its own cinemas in Cambodia and Laos, and the company intends to monitor the development of legislation in these countries to take advantage of the Thai experience. In general, the company has 678 halls for the screening of films, and its plans include increasing their number to one thousand.  It is interesting that the development of such business will contribute to the further spread of cryptocurrencies, that is, there is an obvious positive synergistic effect. It is expected that initially as a means of payment will be accepted Bitcoins, Bitcoin Cash and Litecoin. Thai authorities strongly encourage the use of cryptocurrencies as means of payment. Officially recognized cryptocurrency are Bitcoins, Ethereum, Bitkon Cache, Ethereum classic, Litecoin, Ripple and Lumens.  https://buzcoin.io  https://s6.wampi.ru/2018/08/07/35.md.jpg

Author: buzcoin.io
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: Cryptocurrency. What is it?  For some of you, this is still incomprehensible, completely new, and even a strange phenomenon, mistakenly equated to "pyramids". For others, it is a complex system consisting of rules and exceptions, catching the course of which you can increase your equity at times. For the third - the ability to freely dispose of their own funds, transferring them to the account holder's interest and without fear that at the most inopportune moment – these accounts can simply freeze or some information about their owner will be disclosed.  Mining, investing in interesting or important projects for the society, cryptocurrency trading-now, these are the main ways to increase personal capital, which opened up to us with the advent of cryptocurrencies. As opposed to traditional financial instruments, cryptocurrencies have become a stronghold of real economic freedom. An environment in which a people can personally manage their finances. Manage without fear of interference from the government or banks.  How much can you earn? The answer to this question is simple: the amount will depend on how well you learn the laws of the cryptocurrency world and how you will manage your funds within it. The volatility of cryptocurrencies can overnight lift you to the skies.  And it's absolutely true! We-the team of BUZCOIN, understand perfectly well that bringing new people to the world of cryptocurrencies- we have no right to leave them alone!  That is why we share with you thematic news, conduct webinars, explain difficult things and in every appeal we say– believe in yourself, do not give up and under any circumstances - continue developing! After all, while you are constantly growing over yourself-you will always achieve new, more complex tasks!  Cryptocurrencies - it is possible that in the future, they can become a powerful financial tool that can accelerate the development of entire countries. Now they are an unspoken symbol of economic independency.  A sip of fresh digital freedom. Be free with BUZCOIN project!  https://buzcoin.io  https://s6.wampi.ru/2018/08/07/34.md.jpg

In the U.S. Congress, such way of collection donations have long circulated, especially that this November there will be the elections to the American Parliament. Body: The USA is afraid to "oversleep" the launch of the digital dollar  The former head of the program for the study of the blockchain in US Bank JPMorgan, Amber Baldet, who is also the co-founder and the head of the blockchain company Clovyr, says, "there is no technical reason that the USA cannot have both centralized digital assets and decentralised amount of cryptocoins, such as Bitcoin".  According to him, the opportunities that the technology of the distributed register opens "would be useful in creating a digital US dollar, which would have in this case the same authority in the world as the cash dollar at the present time."  According to Baldet, it is obvious that he is puzzled why the US Federal reserve has not yet taken the initiative to produce a centralized crypto-coin.  🖥 https://buzcoin.io/   Source: https://www.facebook.com/366805253813711/photos/a.369655846861985.1073741828.366805253813711/418364011991168/?type=3&theater

Author: voltesbit777
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: Bermuda will take clear law on ICO  As usual, some world news!  Speaking in the lower house of Bermuda's Parliament, Prime Minister and at the same time Finance Minister David Burt introduced the new ICO rules.  The new regulation specifies what the minimum information you need to disclose at the initial offering of cryptocurrency.  Burt said that the teams that prepare the ICO in Bermuda will have to provide detailed information about all those who prepare this procedure.  It is necessary to have a description of the project (usually such a document is "White paper").  The minimum requirements for such description are set: White Paper should have a product dossier, calculations related to the potential market coverage, a description of the financing scheme for all ICO stages, the amount of funds that are planned to be attracted, as well as technical aspects related to the software that will be used when launching the platform for new crypto-coins, including a description of the features of a particular blockchain.  The Prime Minister stressed that the new legislation should become the most transparent in the world and eliminate any ambiguity in the regulation of this procedure.  🖥 https://buzcoin.io/   Source: https://www.facebook.com/366805253813711/photos/a.369655846861985.1073741828.366805253813711/408574686303434/?type=3&theater

Body: RSA is sure that it is possible to make a lot of money on cryptocurrencies  Fresh research conducted by the company Old Mutual showed that 71% of respondents believe that using cryptocurrency it is possible to make a lot of money.  However, 60% of the population of RSA, which is the second largest economy of the African countries, know almost nothing about cryptocurrency.  19% of respondents said that they know about cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin, but only a little.  17% said that they have information on this topic, and only 4% said that they know a lot about cryptocurrencies.  Among these 21% who know about cryptocurrencies, about a third part (38%) said that they regret that they had not invested in cryptocurrencies before.  53% have no idea how cryptocurrencies work.  43% believe that cryptocurrency is in its principles similar to a financial pyramid.  Meanwhile, Google Trends indicators show that Republica of South Africa has the highest percentage of the population among all countries of the world, which searches the Internet for information about Bitcoin.  RSA has formed a friendly attitude of the authorities to cryptocurrencies.  In April, the head of the banking policy Department of the Central Bank, Brigitte King, said that excessive regulation of cryptocurrency activities can lead to a loss of innovation potential, as well as to a "shortage" in the economic growth of the country.   Tax authorities in RSA consider the income received from investments in cryptocurrency, as subject to taxation, especially if cryptocoins are recorded on the balance sheet of the RSA companies not as cash, but as intangible assets.  https://buzcoin.io  https://s6.wampi.ru/2018/07/23/22843f0675ef351a76.md.jpg

Author: buzcoin.io
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: Bermuda will take clear law on ICO  As usual, some world news!  Speaking in the lower house of Bermuda's Parliament, Prime Minister and at the same time Finance Minister David Burt introduced the new ICO rules.  The new regulation specifies what the minimum information you need to disclose at the initial offering of cryptocurrency.  Burt said that the teams that prepare the ICO in Bermuda will have to provide detailed information about all those who prepare this procedure.  It is necessary to have a description of the project (usually such a document is "White paper").  The minimum requirements for such description are set: White Paper should have a product dossier, calculations related to the potential market coverage, a description of the financing scheme for all ICO stages, the amount of funds that are planned to be attracted, as well as technical aspects related to the software that will be used when launching the platform for new crypto-coins, including a description of the features of a particular blockchain.  The Prime Minister stressed that the new legislation should become the most transparent in the world and eliminate any ambiguity in the regulation of this procedure.  https://buzcoin.io  https://s6.wampi.ru/2018/07/19/123fb75e870b9d6099.md.jpg

Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: ♨️ Coinbase: the use of cryptocurrencies will grow by 60 times  Balaji Srinivasan, Vice-President for technical issues of the largest cryptocurrency trading platform in the US Coinbase. He is sure that the use of cryptocurrency in the world should "catch up" the number of those who use smartphones, which means that the growth in this direction should be 6000%.  He cites the following statistics: in the world less than 1% have cryptocurrency, and 63% of population have smartphones.  This comparison has caused controversy in the social network Twitter, but there is a logic in Srinivasan's thoughts: the fact that surveys show that a significant number of people in the world already know about cryptocurrencies, but do not acquire them and not because they do not want to, but because they do not understand how this can be done.  Since now an increasing number of applications for smartphones offer direct purchase of cryptocurrencies, including Fiat and using Bank cards, the interest and desire of a significant part of mobile device users to purchase cryptocurrencies will be growing.  And smartphone becomes an important "door" in the crypto world, as in its time the Internet gave life to mobile devices, as Tom Lee, an analyst at Fundstrat Global Advisors, said.  🖥 https://buzcoin.io  https://d.radikal.ru/d34/1807/65/df0f99b89dc6.jpg

Body: ING: 15% of Europeans want to be paid in cryptocurrency  One of the largest banking groups in the European Union, ING, headquartered in the Netherlands, published the results of a public opinion survey in Europe, the US and Australia-ING International Survey Mobile Banking.  The study is the sixth and is conducted every year.  The technique is to collect the opinions of about 15 thousand people by conducting a telephone interview with them.  This study was called "Unraveling the essence of cryptocurrencies", which emphasized the great role that cryptocurrencies began to play in modern life.  It is noted that interest in this phenomenon is growing rapidly and this trend will continue in the future.  The report says that " 66% of Europeans said that they have heard about cryptocurrencies. 9% have already purchased it.  Another 16% said that they are going to buy it in the future, which means that the investment interest in cryptocurrencies will almost double.  If we consider that still 34% of Europeans do not know what the phenomenon of "cryptocurrency" is, the growth potential is generally significant."  The study showed that more than one in three respondents in Europe believes that Bitcoin will become the heart of global Finance.  In addition, it turned out that about 30% of European residents already use cryptocurrencies for payments in online stores.  At the same time, 15% are ready to receive payment for their labor in cryptocurrencies.  🖥 https://buzcoin.io/   Source: https://www.facebook.com/366805253813711/photos/a.369655846861985.1073741828.366805253813711/399791567181746/?type=3&theater

Body: BUZCOIN and the economy  What will happen to the Russian economy, and how will the appearance of the tokens BUZCOIN affect it?  Recently Bank of America announced that the world may repeat a strong crisis like the one in 1997-1998. There are always plenty of alarming forecasts, but they often underestimate one thing: new technologies.  It is difficult to imagine what the world would be like now if steam engine or electricity, for example, had not been invented. As a result, the consensus forecast for this cryptocurrency is 15372 dollars by the end of the year. Cardano and EOS are expected to grow by between 250 and 300%, and TRON will jump by 342%.  Earlier, crypto-exchange № 3 in the world on turnover, the Chinese Huobi, headquartered in Singapore, conducted a survey of investors, according to which 71% of them are confident that the market will grow by at least a third by the end of the year. 18.6% expect growth to be between 10 and 30%, and only 10% believe that the market expects a further decline.  On July 5, Huobi announced the opening of an office in Australia, seeing great potential in that country, given the results including a Finder survey. In addition, given the loyal attitude of local authorities to cryptocurrency trading, Huobi launches just ten currency pairs, which will feature the Australian dollar, thus it becomes possible to make direct purchases and sales of cryptocurrencies using conventional money (Fiat). Body: London group of researchers: cryptocurrencies can become a mass means of payment  A group of researchers at Imperial College London distributed a report "Cryptocurrencies: overcoming barriers to trust and distribution", which clearly outlines the prospect: due to the special properties that cryptocoins have, they are likely to become the main method of payment for the purchased goods and services in the world in the next decade.  This conclusion was reached by Professor William Knottenbelt, who heads a group of 24 specialists at the College, who are constantly engaged in the study of blockchain and the phenomenon of cryptocurrencies.  The co-author of the study was also Dr. Zeynep Gurgu from the business school at Imperial College London, and the report was commissioned by eToro.  Despite the fact that social networks have talk that the study turned biased, since its customer was a commercial firm, it is worth noting that eToro itself is only taking the first steps in the crypto-currency world and its main specialization is classic finance, that is, investments in securities, currencies, and derivative financial instruments.  The report notes that modern cryptocurrencies meet all the requirements that apply to Fiat money: they can be a measure of value, a means of payment for goods and services, as well as an instrument of accumulation. At the same time, cryptocurrencies have another thing, which modern money does not have: transactions using crypto-coins proceed in a completely different way, even if they are compared with transactions using electronic money, and the whole "secret" lies in the blockchain.  🖥 https://buzcoin.io/   Source: https://www.facebook.com/366805253813711/photos/a.369655846861985.1073741828.366805253813711/403139280180308/?type=3&theater

As a result, the consensus forecast for this cryptocurrency is 15372 dollars by the end of the year. Cardano and EOS are expected to grow by between 250 and 300%, and TRON will jump by 342%.  Earlier, crypto-exchange № 3 in the world on turnover, the Chinese Huobi, headquartered in Singapore, conducted a survey of investors, according to which 71% of them are confident that the market will grow by at least a third by the end of the year. 18.6% expect growth to be between 10 and 30%, and only 10% believe that the market expects a further decline.  On July 5, Huobi announced the opening of an office in Australia, seeing great potential in that country, given the results including a Finder survey. In addition, given the loyal attitude of local authorities to cryptocurrency trading, Huobi launches just ten currency pairs, which will feature the Australian dollar, thus it becomes possible to make direct purchases and sales of cryptocurrencies using conventional money (Fiat).  The Australian government intends to continue increasing the investment attractiveness of the island state for cryptocurrency investors — including a contract for the amount of one billion Australian dollars (about 750 million US dollars) signed with IBM.  https://buzcoin.io  https://s6.wampi.ru/2018/07/12/0010.md.jpg

Author: buzcoin.io
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: "The main Bitcoin" in France: cryptocurrencies do not need to be regulated  Jean-Pierre Landau, who served as the second Deputy Chairman of the Bank of France from 2006 to 2011, was appointed "chief Bitcoin" by the French government at the beginning of this year: he was instructed to develop a vision of the Third Republic regarding cryptocurrencies.  "Mr. Bitcoin", as he was nicknamed by local media, recently prepared a report in which he made a number of statements. In particular, it States that the French state "has neither the need nor the desire" to regulate cryptocurrencies, since here we are talking more about the new technology.  The report States that regulation threatens to"freeze rapidly changing technology". This is contrary to the legal principle of French regulation, that it should be impartial, that is, neutral relating to the object of application of legal norms.  Therefore, Landau proposes to regulate not the phenomena themselves, but to deal directly with those individuals and legal entities that are related to cryptocurrencies.  At the same time, he is sure that, for example, crypto-exchanges have the right to exist. Moreover, Landau said that they do not need to make excessive demands — enough that they comply with the "minimum principles of transparency, integrity and financial viability".  He believes that cryptocurrencies should be developed in their" virtual Kingdom", and France does not intend to interfere with them in this. However, the authorities of the country plan to make sure that crypto-coins do not become an integral part of the existing financial system, which should not be "infected" with crypto-coins.  Recall that in January, when Jean-Pierre Landau was entrusted with a high state mission, he said he sees in Bitcoins similar to what happened during the "Tulip fever" in the Netherlands.  https://buzcoin.io  https://s6.wampi.ru/2018/07/10/0005.md.jpg

Body: In the future interest in the crypto industry will double  The interest in cryptocurrency and the blockchain in the near future will be doubled.  The study was conducted from March 26 to April 6, 2018 and covered 15 countries and each surveyed about a thousand respondents.  According to the study, 66% of Europeans have heard about cryptocurrencies and 35% agree that the crypto industry is the "future of online payments". Another 35% suggested that the value of cryptocurrencies will grow during the year.  The share of knowledge about the crypto industry is equal to or more than 50% in each participating country. Austria (79%) and Poland (77%) have the highest rates. In the US 57% of respondents heard about cryptocurrencies.  Fewer than 1 / 10 surveyed residents in Europe, the US and Australia have ever owned digital assets. The survey showed that European residents who use mobile banking are much more likely to own cryptocurrencies (12%) than those who do not use it (4%).  Only 9% of respondents have crypto assets but 25% said that they intend to buy them in the future. The highest percentage (18%) of ownership of digital assets is observed in Turkey, the lowest (4%) — in Luxembourg.  🖥 https://buzcoin.io   Reference: https://www.facebook.com/366805253813711/photos/a.369655846861985.1073741828.366805253813711/391472411346995/?type=3

Author: buzcoin.io
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: ING: 15% of Europeans want to be paid in cryptocurrency  One of the largest banking groups in the European Union, ING, headquartered in the Netherlands, published the results of a public opinion survey in Europe, the US and Australia-ING International Survey Mobile Banking.  The study is the sixth and is conducted every year.  The technique is to collect the opinions of about 15 thousand people by conducting a telephone interview with them.  This study was called "Unraveling the essence of cryptocurrencies", which emphasized the great role that cryptocurrencies began to play in modern life.  It is noted that interest in this phenomenon is growing rapidly and this trend will continue in the future.  The report says that " 66% of Europeans said that they have heard about cryptocurrencies. 9% have already purchased it.  Another 16% said that they are going to buy it in the future, which means that the investment interest in cryptocurrencies will almost double.  If we consider that still 34% of Europeans do not know what the phenomenon of "cryptocurrency" is, the growth potential is generally significant."  The study showed that more than one in three respondents in Europe believes that Bitcoin will become the heart of global Finance.  In addition, it turned out that about 30% of European residents already use cryptocurrencies for payments in online stores.  At the same time, 15% are ready to receive payment for their labor in cryptocurrencies.  https://buzcoin.io  https://s6.wampi.ru/2018/07/09/0002.md.jpg

And today we would like to touch upon an actual topic — football.  Russia hosts the World Cup and former players of the Spanish football club “Barcelona” Carles Puyol, Andres Iniesta and Ivan De La Peña together with the development team announced the launch of the social network Olyseum, designed specially to communicate with football fans with their idols.  The project is a universal social network created on the blockchain.  Also, Olyseum will have a smart-contract-based program to stimulate users who participate in the development of the community.  As a reward, they will receive exclusive goods, VIP-tickets and a unique experience with the stars of football.  Ex-Barcelona players say that they want to establish closer relations with their own fans in this way.  Testing of the social network is already in full swing and was specially made during the days when in Russia is the World Cup.  https://buzcoin.io   Source: https://medium.com/@buzcoin/football-and-blockchain-a7eec7dd9b9d

Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: Marriage certificates in the bitcoin blockchain   Bitfury Group company ensured the authenticity of the marriage of 20 couples by placing their marriage certificates in the bitcoin blockchain.  According to the first newlyweds now their documents are permanently recorded in a reliable and public database. And if documentation of the marriage is required, it can be easily retrieved from a secure repository.  According to Bitfury team, the new solution shows the power and security of the blockchain and will facilitate the transition to this technology of state system registers.  “The blockchain is just beginning to turn into a means of storing state documents, and a marriage certificate is a great start,” said Valery Vavilov, Bitfury CEO.  https://buzcoin.io   Source: https://medium.com/@buzcoin/marriage-certificates-in-the-bitcoin-blockchain-473b3fd8ac26

Author: buzcoin.io
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: In the future interest in the crypto industry will double  The interest in cryptocurrency and the blockchain in the near future will be doubled.  The study was conducted from March 26 to April 6, 2018 and covered 15 countries and each surveyed about a thousand respondents.  According to the study, 66% of Europeans have heard about cryptocurrencies and 35% agree that the crypto industry is the "future of online payments". Another 35% suggested that the value of cryptocurrencies will grow during the year.  The share of knowledge about the crypto industry is equal to or more than 50% in each participating country. Austria (79%) and Poland (77%) have the highest rates. In the US 57% of respondents heard about cryptocurrencies.  Fewer than 1 / 10 surveyed residents in Europe, the US and Australia have ever owned digital assets. The survey showed that European residents who use mobile banking are much more likely to own cryptocurrencies (12%) than those who do not use it (4%).  Only 9% of respondents have crypto assets but 25% said that they intend to buy them in the future. The highest percentage (18%) of ownership of digital assets is observed in Turkey, the lowest (4%) — in Luxembourg.  https://buzcoin.io  https://s6.wampi.ru/2018/06/30/06.md.jpg

He believes that it would be great if Bitcoin replaced the outgoing US dollar in the US economy. Body: Marriage certificates in the bitcoin blockchain  Bitfury Group company ensured the authenticity of the marriage of 20 couples by placing their marriage certificates in the bitcoin blockchain.  According to the first newlyweds now their documents are permanently recorded in a reliable and public database. And if documentation of the marriage is required, it can be easily retrieved from a secure repository.  According to Bitfury team, the new solution shows the power and security of the blockchain and will facilitate the transition to this technology of state system registers.  "The blockchain is just beginning to turn into a means of storing state documents, and a marriage certificate is a great start," said Valery Vavilov, Bitfury CEO.  https://buzcoin.io  https://s6.wampi.ru/2018/06/27/63.md.jpg

Author: voltesbit777
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: Do you know that today you can already buy real estate for bitcoins?    At least, if we are talking about luxury apartments of Dukley Gardens residential complex in Montenegro!  Nowadays, in this complex three luxury apartments have been already bought for a total of 420 bitcoins, which is equivalent to the amount of approximately 3.2 million US dollars.  Dukley Gardens residential complex is located in Budva (Montenegro), which is one of the largest tourist centers located on the entire Adriatic coast.  The complex consists of 202 luxury apartments with an area of 80–212 square meters with 1–3 bedrooms.  The cost of a one-bedroom apartment will cost its new owner 125 bitcoins, and for a two-level penthouse will have to pay 800 bitcoins.  In many ways, the implementation of transactions for bitcoins was due to the efforts of the local company AMIA (Astra Montenegro Investment Association), which is engaged in active promotion of the cryptocurrency and convinces them to accept payment for restaurants and hotels in Budva.  By the way, precisely because today few companies in the world accept cryptocurrencies, AMIA has managed to increase the number of its regular customers.  One of them is a 25-year-old crypto-enthusiast from France, who said the process of buying real estate for bitcoins was very fast.  The transaction was held with the participation of the law firm Prelević’s, the cryptocurrency was converted into Euros immediately after the signing of the documents and the implementation of the bitcoin transaction.  Cryptocurrencies continue to gain popularity!  And what cryptocurrency do you prefer?  https://buzcoin.io   source: https://medium.com/@buzcoin/do-you-know-that-today-you-can-already-buy-real-estate-for-bitcoins-fe4565172056

Author: voltesbit777
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: The professional team of the project BUZAR is actively and intensively working on its development.  For the full implementation of our project we have developed a detailed plan of our actions which we will share with you today.  The work on the project BUZAR began relatively recently-just in April 2018. Then we launched our Pre-ICO of the project, within the framework of which our first investors were able to purchase BUZCOIN tokens on the most favorable terms.  The ICO for BUZCOIN tokens is planned for August-September 2018, for which we have developed a special system of bonuses and incentives.  After the generation and distribution of BUZCOIN tokens we will be able to start drafting the terms of reference, purchasing equipment and developing software for the platform.  Already in 2019 we will start the release of MVP, testing and launch of the mobile version of the platform, launch of the messenger with text messages/audio and video calls, launch of B2C and C2C segments of the super-marketplace, introduction of online stores on the platform, launch of the platform participants’ reward program, integration of P2P payments into the messenger, launch of stream and video hosting on the platform, testing and implementation of the “app-in-app” model, activation of group purchases, as well as the launch of housing search and recruitment applications.  At the beginning of 2020 we will only have to launch the B2B segment of the super-marketplace and continue working on the development and expansion of the project. Thus, the platform BUZAR will be fully launched already in the foreseeable future, without which it will be difficult to imagine everyday life, because it will become an indispensable tool in all spheres of life.  https://buzcoin.io   source: https://medium.com/@buzcoin/the-professional-team-of-the-project-buzar-is-actively-and-intensively-working-on-its-development-795c24c8af2e

Author: buzcoin.io
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: Why the launch of BUZCOIN is very important  The cryptocurrency market has been developing for a long time: the oldest cryptocurrency Bitcoin is more than nine years old.  It would seem that isn't it too late to enter the market for BUZCOIN?  Not at all: it's high time!  When analysts and investors see the weaknesses of different crypto projects, which, unfortunately, often can not be corrected completely, as it is impossible to fix anything in the bike, if you are already riding it. Author: buzcoin.io
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: Good afternoon, dear friends!  Well, are you ready for a new piece of information? Today we have prepared for you a very interesting material.  This time our headline topic is "an option"  About the option we can say that this is one of the most complex financial instruments traded on the stock exchange. In general, an option is a special type of contract the subject of which is not the asset itself but the right to sell or buy it. Thus, a seller agrees with a buyer to sell a certain asset at a predetermined cost and the buyer has the right to buy the asset at this price, but is not obliged, i.e. he may not make a deal.  The price of the asset specified in the contract is called strike (eng. strike price). It may differ from the market price that has developed on the asset. (spot price).  Types of options are divided into: 1) by action, 2) by the period of execution, 3) by type of asset. Now let's take a closer look at each of them.  It is accepted to allocate 2 types of options on action: 1. Call Options. (To purchase goods.)They ensure buyer's right to acquire the underlying asset. At the same time, a call option is an obligation of seller to sell it. 2. Put Options. (On the sale of an asset.) This type of option ensures the right of buyer to sell the asset. At the same time, put option is an obligation of the seller to purchase the underlying asset.  By the term of execution options are divided into: 1. European-can be presented by buyer only on the LAST day of the option. 2. American. Everything is quite different here, it can be executed absolutely on any working day in the period from the date of the transaction to the date of execution. That is, during the entire term of the contract.  And the last, by the form of an asset is usually divided into: 1. Currency option. It gives the right to buy or sell foreign currency. 2. Stock option. The option holder buys or sells shares. 3. Commodity option. Gives the right to sell or buy a certain amount of goods (for example, oil, platinum, silver, gold)  There are many other parameters for classifications, we have identified only the most basic. https://d.radikal.ru/d22/1806/82/124967d61241.jpg

Gradually, consumer confidence in the crypto currency grew, all new alternative electronic funds began to appear.  At the moment, there are already a huge number of them, including innovative is the crypto currency of the Russian star, actress and TV presenter - Olga Buzovoy.  This digital asset buzkoina will be part of the platform BUZAR - an alternative social network and a unique marketplace.  The platform with a simple and convenient interface is reliably protected and secured by data security. In addition to communication within the system, anyone can use it as a trading platform, avoiding work with intermediaries.  What are the advantages of the BUZAR platform?  1⃣ Experienced team of specialists. 2⃣ Low market commissions. 3⃣ Innovativeness of the functional. 4⃣ It will be possible to exchange video calls on specialized encrypted channels. 5⃣ Video hosting and video broadcasting. 6⃣ Built-in music service. 7⃣ Availability of message boards and online auctions. 8⃣ Multiple introduction of online stores, services for sales and rental of real estate. 9⃣ Exchange of crypto-currency and P2P-payments. 🔟 Calendar of events, purchase of tickets for various concerts and events. With this statement Benham spoke at the BFI summit in New York in early June.  "Digital currencies will become part of the economic practice of any country, anywhere. These currencies will not go anywhere, they will spread to all economies in all corners of the planet. Survival of some places, small countries, can become dependent on virtual assets .... The Commissioner also expressed the opinion that already now American regulators also recognize: bitcoin and other crypto-currencies "will become a part of the economy of any country". Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: The professional team of the BUZAR project is actively and intensively working on its development.    For the full implementation of our project, we have developed a detailed plan of our actions, which we will share with you today.  ✅ Work on the BUZAR project began relatively recently - in April 2018 alone. Then we launched the PreICO of our project, in which our first investors were able to purchase BUZCON tokens on the most favorable terms.  ✅ For August-September 2018, the ICO token BUZSOIN is planned, specifically for which we developed a special system of bonuses and incentives.  ✅ After generating and distributing BUZCON tokens, we will be able to begin drafting the terms of reference, purchasing equipment and developing software for the platform.  ✅ As early as 2019, we will start releasing MVP, testing and launching the mobile version of the platform, launching a messenger with text messages / audio and video calls, launching B2C and C2C segments of the supermarket, introducing the online shopping platform, launching a compensation program participants of the platform, integration of P2P payments into the messenger, launching on the platform of streams and video hosting, testing and implementation of the "Application in the application" model, activation of group purchases, and launch of housing search applications and recruiting.  ✅ At the beginning of 2020, we will only have to run the B2B segment of the supermarket and continue to work on the development and expansion of the project.  Thus, in the foreseeable future, the BUZAR multifunctional platform will be fully launched, without which it will be impossible to imagine everyday life, because it will become an indispensable assistant in absolutely all spheres of activity.  Start your path to success today - join the BUZAR project!  https://buzcoin.io/en   reference:  https://golos.io/ito/@buzcoin/professionalnaya-komanda-proekta-buzar-vedyot-aktivnuyu-i-intensivnuyu-rabotu-nad-ego-razvitiem

Body: t's interesting!  ♨️ Mastercard got a patent on blockchain-system for the tourist industry!  With its help, tourists will be able to identify the desired routes, and sellers will offer their value.  The patent was received by the company in uspto (U.S. patent and trademark office). It will provide tourists with an expanded choice of airlines, hotels and other service providers - by design of developers, this should contribute to global optimization of the tourism industry.  Thanks to a new solution, tourists will be able to provide full information about their routes to all participants in the blockchain chain. Based on these data, operators will be able to send their applications for reservation that will be evaluated by the server and return to tourists.  Recently, Mastercard won another patent - a sales point that uses blockchain to verify cash data. In addition, earlier in June, she applied for the use of blockchain technology to verify the authenticity of user coupons.  Blockchain Technology is getting deeper into our daily lives. Body: Do you know that today you can already buy real estate for bitcoins?  At least, if we are talking about luxury apartments of Dukley Gardens residential complex in Montenegro!  Nowadays, in this complex three luxury apartments have been already bought for a total of 420 bitcoins, which is equivalent to the amount of approximately 3.2 million US dollars.  Dukley Gardens residential complex is located in Budva (Montenegro), which is one of the largest tourist centers located on the entire Adriatic coast.  The complex consists of 202 luxury apartments with an area of 80-212 square meters with 1-3 bedrooms.  The cost of a one-bedroom apartment will cost its new owner 125 bitcoins, and for a two-level penthouse will have to pay 800 bitcoins.  In many ways, the implementation of transactions for bitcoins was due to the efforts of the local company AMIA (Astra Montenegro Investment Association), which is engaged in active promotion of the cryptocurrency and convinces them to accept payment for restaurants and hotels in Budva.  By the way, precisely because today few companies in the world accept cryptocurrencies, AMIA has managed to increase the number of its regular customers.  One of them is a 25-year-old crypto-enthusiast from France, who said the process of buying real estate for bitcoins was very fast.  The transaction was held with the participation of the law firm Prelević's, the cryptocurrency was converted into Euros immediately after the signing of the documents and the implementation of the bitcoin transaction. Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: The Number of Women Traders Has Doubled!  The British crypto exchange LBX has published research data for its audience.  It turns out that the number of women traders has doubled within the last 6 months, basically, due to the younger generation.  Potential investors are attracted to the cooperation with the exchange thanks to a lot of currency pairs, the cryptocurrency popularity, and the official registration of the exchange in the FCA.  The platform, in turn, receives an influx of new customers. Thus, this process is beneficial for both parties.  LBX employees note that now each of 8 women (13%) in the country decided to invest in cryptocurrency. Six months ago this indicator was at the level of 6% of the total population of Great Britain.   As statistics shows convincingly, the increase occurred thanks to young people. In the age category of 18–20 years each of 5 women invest in the cryptocurrency.  LBX senior business analyst, Agnes de Royer, said that the crypto market formed a misconception about the lack of potential interest in trading cryptocurrency by females. In fact, this is not true:  “We see hundreds of daily registrations, lots of inspirational stories and excellent successes of women traders. This motivates us to move forward, providing an optimal package of services for our users. “  The LBX report also says that against the background of a sharp increase in the interest in trading by women, this indicator is much lower among the male part of the population. This is due to a different approach to the investment process.  Women:  ✅ are not inclined to pursue the benefits; ✅ tend to consult their friends and family more often.  Male traders have a more aggressive style of trading, which sometimes plays a cruel joke against them. Women measure seven times, cut once!  https://buzcoin.io  https://s5.wampi.ru/2018/06/15/15fe455c79e70bef19.md.jpg

Author: buzcoin.io
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: Prospects for the development of the cryptocurrency market.  Blockchain technologies are becoming more popular and occupy more place in life of modern man.   The development of digital information and its protection is improving every day and simply amazes with its complexity and reliability.  The prospect of cryptocurrency development looks definitely bright.   It is subject to the natural laws of supply and demand, and with the increase in those wishing to buy the issue does not increase.  According to 3 famous headliners (Katelin Breitman, Balaji Sreenivasan and Peter Smith) the future of cryptocurrency can be expressed by the following statements:  1⃣ There will be a gradual introduction of electronic money in the lives of ordinary people. 2⃣ Decentralized systems will not replace the Bank but will complement each other. 3⃣ Certain benefits will have to be sacrificed to improve security. 4⃣ The stable situation in the next 5 years can not be expected. 5⃣ Even the best experts cannot predict the exact ups and downs, it is necessary to focus on the available charts.  As for the development of the cryptocurrency market in Russia, at the moment there are still some objections of quite influential forces in the Ministry of Finance of the Russian Federation and a number of other departments, but the government and leading banks still agreed that it is useful for the economy.  In addition, there were clear instructions to support and develop the industry.  The development is directly related to the General legalization of cryptocurrency in the market.  The introduction of the draft law on the regulation of the CFA in Russia will significantly protect participants from numerous risks.  But at the moment there is no clear legal status and regulation system in respect of this currency system.  As with all technological innovations, it takes time to gain confidence and form the legal and economic prerequisites for development, cryptocurrency is no exception.  So we just have to wait.  According to many analysts of the crypto-currency market, all as one say that this is a new future behind which there are many prospects.  It is assumed that the cryptocurrency will firmly enter our lives, as well as future generations.  https://buzcoin.io  https://s5.wampi.ru/2018/06/14/unnamed.png
