Author: voltesbit777
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: Crypto currency: what is it and what are its advantages?  Very soon our webinar will begin, or rather June 20 at 20:00 Moscow time, where you will learn how you can change your life and turn your dreams into reality.  In the meantime, we share with you useful information that may come in handy.  This time we will talk about the Crypto currency.  What it is?  It's simple, it's the same cash, but decentralized and digitized. This is a special kind of electronic means of payment in the form of mathematical code. When you use money, you use the cryptographic elements (electronic signature), hence the name.  The use of crypto currency is done through the "block" system (a single chain of information blocks), which reliably stores information and does not allow fraudsters to change data in any way, etc.  What are the advantages of crypto currency?  1️⃣ It's impossible to steal - you can withdraw money only if you know the private key. Another positive aspect is the transparency of all operations. It is impossible to deceive this system or do anything so that others will not know about it.  2️⃣ Small commissions - for transferring several million dollars to another country will take from zero to $ 5.  3️⃣ There is no central server that can hack or disable.  4️⃣ There is almost no inflation in the crypto-currency world.  5️⃣ Crypto-currency transfers do not know the boundaries. Being geographically in one pole of the world, you can transfer them to the very opposite. In this case, the usual money transfer is not only costly and requires the filling of a mass of accompanying documents, but also takes some time. The crypto-currency transaction is almost instantaneous.  Summing up, we can say that the crypto currency has become a modern universal way of owning a currency, the prospects of which are visible to the naked eye.  https://buzcoin.io/en   reference: https://golos.io/ito/@buzcoin/kriptovalyuta-chto-eto-takoe-i-v-chyom-eyo-preimushestva

Body: An interesting fact!  Probably, you already know that entries in the blockchain chain cannot be edited.  But do you know why?  Blockchain is a distributed database that is stored in the form of multiple identical copies on a large number of computers.  Any new entries made to the database are immediately distributed throughout the network thanks to the constant synchronization of these copies.   reference:  https://medium.com/@buzcoin/an-interesting-fact-26aa5f52e946

Author: voltesbit777
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: Will ICO support in Russia at the legislative level?  Literally in May of this year, State Duma deputies approved in the first reading the draft Federal Law "On Digital Financial Assets", which, in particular, specifies the general rules for the regulation of the ICO market.  And the other day the chairman of the State Duma Financial Market Committee Anatoly Aksakov stated the importance of supporting the ICO in Russia at the legislative level.  "If it works that way, then we need to create conditions, and, quite possibly, it can also make good money for us. Especially, everyone says that most of the ICO participants are Russian-speaking people, "the deputy said.  According to the deputy, this form of attracting investments can positively affect the country's economy.  Aksakov also cited world statistics: worldwide, for the first quarter of 2018, the volume of funds raised through the ICO was $ 3.3 billion.  Thus, given the prospects of ICO projects, the legalization of ICO in the Russian Federation would be a new stage in the country's economic development.  https://buzcoin.io/en   reference:  https://golos.io/ito/@buzcoin/podderzhat-li-ico-v-rossii-na-zakonodatelnom-urovne

Body: A co-founder of HIT Foundation became the most influential woman in the blockchain industry  At the end of May in Berlin during the conference BlockShow Europe 2018 was named the most influential woman in the industry.  According to the results of the poll, it was Dr. Kui Vo — Reinhard, a co-founder and director of data management at HIT Foundation.  “I was born in a country where 40 years ago most people thought that a woman’s place was in the kitchen. I’ve come a long way, and now I’m here, I’m getting an award for what I do for women in technology. I dedicate this award to all women working in the industry,” — said Vo-Reinhard.  Also among the leading companies in the industry were named BitFury (1st place), Cardano (2nd place) and Lisk (3rd place).  https://buzcoin.io  reference: https://medium.com/@buzcoin/a-co-founder-of-hit-foundation-became-the-most-influential-woman-in-the-blockchain-industry-ed9b4388d5da

Body: Will the ICO be supported in Russia at the legislative level?  This year in May the deputies of the State Duma of the Russian Federation approved in the first reading the draft Federal law "On digital financial assets", which, in particular, stipulates the general rules of ICO market regulation.  A few days ago, the Chairman of the State Duma Committee on the financial market Anatoly Aksakov said about the importance of supporting ICO in Russia at the legislative level.  "If it works this way, it is necessary to create conditions, and, quite possibly, it can also make good money in our country. Moreover, everyone says that most of the ICO participants are Russian — speaking people," the Deputy said.  According to the Deputy this form of investment can have a positive impact on the economy.  Aksakov also cited the world statistics: worldwide, in the first quarter of 2018, the amount of funds raised through the ICO amounted to $3.3 billion.  Thus, given the prospects of ICO projects, the legalization of ICO in the Russian Federation would be a new stage in the economic development of the country.  https://buzcoin.io  https://s5.wampi.ru/2018/06/05/573dec8ddbaa341b7b.md.jpg

Body: A co-founder of HIT Foundation became the most influential woman in the blockchain industry  At the end of May in Berlin during the conference BlockShow Europe 2018 was named the most influential woman in the industry.  According to the results of the poll, it was Dr. Kui Vo – Reinhard, a co-founder and director of data management at HIT Foundation.  "I was born in a country where 40 years ago most people thought that a woman's place was in the kitchen. I've come a long way, and now I'm here, I'm getting an award for what I do for women in technology. I dedicate this award to all women working in the industry," — said Vo-Reinhard.  Also among the leading companies in the industry were named BitFury (1st place), Cardano (2nd place) and Lisk (3rd place).  https://buzcoin.io  https://s5.wampi.ru/2018/06/05/58b2923a9b75ee2450.md.jpg

Author: buzcoin.io
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: An interesting fact!  Probably, you already know that entries in the blockchain chain cannot be edited.  But do you know why?  Blockchain is a distributed database that is stored in the form of multiple identical copies on a large number of computers.  Any new entries made to the database are immediately distributed throughout the network thanks to the constant synchronization of these copies.  A single and continuous blockchain consists of information blocks, into which all new changes are recorded.  The blockchain has cryptographic protection – that is, each user of the chain can make new changes to it only on the basis of the actions performed by him earlier (thanks to encryption).  It is not possible for one user to write to the block on behalf of another, because each user on the network has his own cryptographic key which is known only to him.  Thus, none of the entries that got into the blockchain can be changed or erased later, since it would require simultaneous action on all nodes of the network, which is almost impossible to do!  Therefore, data that has been entered into the blockchain will not be subject to arbitrary deletion or falsification.  https://buzcoin.io  https://s5.wampi.ru/2018/06/06/1e60cb28e19d67e16.md.jpg

Author: voltesbit777
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: Why did we call our project BUZAR?    It is not difficult to guess that the first 3 letters of the name were borrowed from the name of the founder of the project — Olga Buzova. However, this is not the only reason why we have chosen this name.  BUZAR platform will be a marketplace for the sale and exchange of goods and services.  Previously, the role of such a trading platform in the world played markets. The term “Bazaar” itself is derived from the word bāzār of Persian origin and later became used in other countries.  For the first time bazaars appeared more than 3000 years before our era and initially they developed outside the city walls — often they served the needs of running caravans.  When the cities began to expand and become more densely populated, bazaars moved to urban centers and began to develop along the streets that connect the opposite gates of the city with each other.  Over time, these bazaars formed a network of shopping centers, allowing the exchange of information and products.  BUZAR is a new level trading platform with which you can not only buy and sell goods and services without intermediaries, but also to expand your circle of communication, find like-minded people, old and new friends, arrange your personal life.  Learn more about the project BUZAR on our website https://buzcoin.io   Reference: https://medium.com/@buzcoin/why-did-we-call-our-project-buzar-f97b5adc1c16

Author: buzcoin.io
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: Why did we call our project BUZAR?  It is not difficult to guess that the first 3 letters of the name were borrowed from the name of the founder of the project – Olga Buzova. However, this is not the only reason why we have chosen this name.  BUZAR platform will be a marketplace for the sale and exchange of goods and services.  Previously, the role of such a trading platform in the world played markets. The term "Bazaar" itself is derived from the word bāzār of Persian origin and later became used in other countries.  For the first time bazaars appeared more than 3000 years before our era and initially they developed outside the city walls – often they served the needs of running caravans.  When the cities began to expand and become more densely populated, bazaars moved to urban centers and began to develop along the streets that connect the opposite gates of the city with each other.  Over time, these bazaars formed a network of shopping centers, allowing the exchange of information and products.  BUZAR is a new level trading platform with which you can not only buy and sell goods and services without intermediaries, but also to expand your circle of communication, find like-minded people, old and new friends, arrange your personal life.  Learn more about the project BUZAR on our website  https://buzcoin.io  https://s5.wampi.ru/2018/05/31/50.md.jpg

Author: buzcoin.io
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: The Simpsons mine bitcoins  Today "bitcoin" and "blockchain" have become household words, everybody’s familiar with.  Crypto-terms are seem to be used almost in every sphere of life.  Indeed, according to Forklog portal, the recent step of Bitcoin towards mass adoption is featuring the popular freemium game, The Simpsons: Tapped Out.  The game begins as per usual: Homer is not taking his nuclear power plant job seriously, playing mobile games instead of working.  Martin is talking about blockchain all the time, mentioning it numerous times, without explaining exactly what it is.  Admitting that he had never heard of blockchain “until last week”, he says: “I mined some bitcoin with my computer, and then the value went through the roof” and adds: “Now I act like I’m an expert on it!”  Once players completed this task, they are also be asked to encourage three youngsters to mine bitcoin on their computers.  https://buzcoin.io  https://s5.wampi.ru/2018/05/31/51.md.jpg

Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: The main driving force of the implementation and development of the project BUZAR is people!  Only future users and clients of the platform will enable us to achieve successful implementation of our project.  We are fully aware that today the sphere of marketplaces and various social services is already quite crowded – every year dozens of new programs and applications are published.  However, only a few of them manage to reach an audience and popularity comparable to Aliexpress, Instagram, Telegram, WeChat.  The trump card of our platform BUZAR which effectively distinguishes it from its analogues – is its founder and brand Ambassador Olga Buzova.  Olga is the most popular Russian celebrity. Her stories in Instagram are in the world TOP 3 - such fame has not been achieved by all the world-class celebrities.  Olga's post on Instagram is now considered one of the most effective ways to advertise a product in Russia.  In addition, our team has extensive professional experience in promoting – for PR of brands we cooperate with many large international companies.  Also in favor of the platform will play the fact that Olga already has her own business experience-she owns a clothing brand "OLGA BUZOVA DESIGN".  BUZAR platform is doomed to success! Author: buzcoin.io
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: Warren Buffett-you’re wrong!  After Warren Buffett once again criticized bitcoin and the cryptocurrency industry the Icelandic company Genesis Mining, which provides services in the field of cloud mining, decided to remind the famous investor that not all his judgments in the past were correct.  A co-founder of Genesis Mining Marco Krohn said on Twitter that his company has installed billboards in front of Buffett’s office, with which they tried to show that in this situation not everything is so clear.  "Warren, you said you were wrong about Google and Amazon. Maybe you are wrong about bitcoin?"  At the beginning of May Buffett and his partner from Berkshire Hathaway Charles Munger did not mince words, criticized bitcoin, called bitcoin “rat poison in the box” and reminded investors that they would be in a deplorable situation, as soon as “the euphoria will evaporate”.  A week before, Buffett said that buying bitcoin had nothing to do with investing, but rather is a speculative game each participant of which hopes that he will be able to resell the cryptocurrency at a higher price.  In response to these statements venture capitalist Fred Wilson wrote that bitcoin is a full-fledged investment, because”it feeds the decentralized infrastructure that exists on the basis of fundamental Internet protocols.”  https://buzcoin.io  https://s5.wampi.ru/2018/05/30/40.md.jpg

Author: voltesbit777
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: Specificity of the platform BUZAR    One of the features of the project BUZAR-is a model “application in the application” implemented in the platform thanks to which hundreds and thousands of applications and companies will be able to integrate into its work through the open API and access to its client base.  Users of the platform BUZAR will have a lot of opportunities, including:  ✔️making audio and video calls; ✔️exchange files and messages using encrypted channels; ✔️placement of advertisements on the offer of services or sale of goods; ✔️stream music and video; ✔️purchase tickets for concerts; ✔️view concerts online; ✔️playing online games; ✔️reading of books; ✔️property and job search; ✔️creating their own online store; ✔️make group purchases; ✔️transfer cryptocurrency BUZCOIN to other members; ✔️pay for services and goods with cryptocurrency BUZZOIN; ✔️conducting transactions with minimal costs in the shortest possible time; ✔️advertising products among potential customers (by integrating the social component into the platform); ✔️quick search of potential suppliers, contractors and sellers; ✔️dispute resolutions, inside the platform with the help of her “Garant-system”.  Thus, BUZAR platform is an effective tool for creating and developing business of any level: from plumbing services in a small town to a global international consortium.  At the same time, BUZAR is a new gold standard of social service in the world that meets all the requirements of the user.  More information about the project BUZAR — on our official website https://buzcoin.io   source: https://medium.com/@buzcoin/specificity-of-the-platform-buzar-1cba05ce12ca

Andrey has extensive experience in founding and running a business — he is an owner of “Multi Land” group of companies, as well as a co-owner of the “Algorithm blockchain club”, “Algorithm group” and “Siberia trading” (Swiss). Author: voltesbit777
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: Do you know a well — known bitcoin logo — no longer a public domain, but someone’s property?    In April 2018, the British company A. B. C. IPHoldings South West LLC acquired the trademark “Bitcoin” and now threatens the entrepreneur who sells t-shirts with the logo of bitcoin with a lawsuit!  On May 2018 the entrepreneur received a letter from the company, which claimed its rights to the trademark “Bitcoin” in the UK.  At first, he could not believe it, since a similar application for the registration of the trademark “Bitcoin” was rejected even in the US.  However, having studied the issue in more detail, he found out that A. B. C. IPHoldings South West LLC filed an application to the office of intellectual property of Britain in December 2017, and today it really owns it.  The brand applies to such classes of goods as shoes, clothing, alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages.  The trademark “Bitcoin” was registered in Russia in April 2016.  However, then Alex Fork (a member of the Blockchain Board community) stated that this sign will not be used by Bitcoin LLC for commercial purposes.  Moreover, the sign was registered in order to prevent the possible monopolization of the Bitcoin brand in one hand, followed by the pumping of funds from Russian users of cryptocurrencies.  https://buzcoin.io   Source: https://medium.com/@buzcoin/do-you-know-a-well-known-bitcoin-logo-no-longer-a-public-domain-but-someones-property-5fe0bfe30dd6

Author: buzcoin.io
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: Do you know a well – known bitcoin logo - no longer a public domain, but someone's property?  In April 2018, the British company A. B. C. IPHoldings South West LLC acquired the trademark "Bitcoin" and now threatens the entrepreneur who sells t-shirts with the logo of bitcoin with a lawsuit!  On May 2018 the entrepreneur received a letter from the company, which claimed its rights to the trademark "Bitcoin" in the UK.  At first, he could not believe it, since a similar application for the registration of the trademark "Bitcoin" was rejected even in the US.  However, having studied the issue in more detail, he found out that A. B. C. IPHoldings South West LLC filed an application to the office of intellectual property of Britain in December 2017, and today it really owns it.  The brand applies to such classes of goods as shoes, clothing, alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages.  The trademark "Bitcoin" was registered in Russia in April 2016.  However, then Alex Fork (a member of the Blockchain Board community) stated that this sign will not be used by Bitcoin LLC for commercial purposes.  Moreover, the sign was registered in order to prevent the possible monopolization of the Bitcoin brand in one hand, followed by the pumping of funds from Russian users of cryptocurrencies.  https://buzcoin.io  https://s5.wampi.ru/2018/05/30/49.md.jpg

Author: buzcoin.io
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: Was Bitcoin recognized as an absolutely hopeless mean of payments?  Do you know that in the early years of Bitcoin more than 9 out of 10 financial experts in the world recognized it as an absolutely hopeless means of payment?  However, for almost 10 years this cryptocurrency continues not only to improve constantly, but also to beat new records for its value.  But if to think about it, what interesting things do we know about Bitcoin?  ✅ Bitcoin appeared in 2008 and its creator is Satoshi Nakamoto. Interestingly that it is still unknown who is this person, or a group of mysterious experts. The most likely version is that the creator of this cryptocurrency is an American of Japanese origin whose name is Dorian Nakamoto, but actually this option has not received reliable evidence.  ✅ As you know, the maximum number of Bitcoins is limited to 21 million coins. For today  more than half of this number  has been produced - the algorithm for the extraction is becoming more and more complex and reduces the total number of created coins every few years. It is believed that the last Bitcoin will be mined only in 2140.  ✅ The first million of BTC was mined by Satoshi Nakamoto and many experts think that it still belongs to him. Many curious users are trying to find the purses of Nakamoto to get on the trail of its creator, but no-one has managed to do this.  ✅ Only 36% of all Bitcoin coins was marked in any transactions and payment transactions. All the remaining coins, about 64% of their total number have never been used. Users are likely holding them with the expectation of an even greater increase in BTC cost.  Of course, these are not all the interesting facts about cryptocurrency and bitcoin!  Throughout the history of the existence of this cryptocurrency there was still a huge number of significant and interesting events!  And maybe you can add to these facts something interesting?  Waiting for your stories in the comments!  https://buzcoin.io  https://s5.wampi.ru/2018/05/27/41-1.md.jpg

Author: buzcoin.io
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: BUZAR is a "super-marketplace"  Yesterday we talked about what kinds of problems have the modern marketplace services! And today we will discuss how BUZAR is to solve these problems!  Using the technology of smart contracts, our platform will give access to anyone who wants to place the goods on the platform, and at the same time, will be completely transparent.  The advantages of smart contracts will allow to fully implement the project concept. Moreover, users will be able to purchase not only goods, but also services from different artists at BUZAR. Due to this, the platform will combine a wide range of features that will attract and keep users here for the longest period of time.  The platform itself will play the role of a mediator and a guarantor, which, using technologies and smart contracts, will exclude the possibility of fraud during transactions on BUZAR.  We will create a special service of guaranteed transactions, the essence of which is that a client will make a purchase on BUZAR platform and a seller will receive a fee only after the transfer of the goods or the execution of an order.  In case of disputes, BUZAR will act as an arbitrator who will make final decisions.  Thanks to this, BUZAR has all the chances to become a transparent and honest super-marketplace, which will combine a large number of activities and will have the widest possible customer base.  BUZAR site will operate in three segments simultaneously:  1️⃣ C2C (client – to-client);  2️⃣ B2C (business – to-customer);  3️⃣ B2B (business to business).  To make payments between participants a token of the ERC20 standard will be issued on the Ethereum blockchain platform.  With the development of the platform it is planned to connect to BUZCOIN more and more people.  We want people around the world to be closer to each other.  BUZAR is a global online platform that is both convenient for communication and e-Commerce. It is a new generation IT platform.  https://buzcoin.io  https://s5.wampi.ru/2018/05/23/34f94b45b48891b5d3.md.jpg

Author: buzcoin.io
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: Treasures of Pirate…  Do you know that once in the network there was a site Silk Road, where you could buy military equipment, weapons, illicit drugs and more!  And all for bitcoins ... thanks to bitcoins this site gained popularity because the cryptocurrency was considered anonymous, buyers felt protected.  The creator of the site Silk Road had a pseudonym Pirate and was long considered elusive, and analysts said that on his website spun about 5% of all extracted at the time bitcoins!  When the authorities closed the site and found the owner, they found only 20% of the total, but the remaining 80% Pirate safely tucked away!  Many enthusiasts are still looking for the treasures of Pirate, but so far no one has managed to find them!  https://buzcoin.io  https://s5.wampi.ru/2018/05/24/35.md.jpg

Author: voltesbit777
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: Problems of the modern marketplace     There is such a concept that a wide range of goods or services implies an increase in sales.  That is, the more products of different categories are presented on your site, the higher the chance that the buyer will buy something.  And this is actually true, and that is why in the modern world marketplace service is developing so fast!  But if everything is so perfect, why do we create BUZAR platform? Because the marketplace has a number of serious drawbacks!  ▫️Problematic withdrawals faced by sellers, as each marketplace introduces its own restrictions on withdrawals and sometimes the process takes more than a month.  ▫️The probability of fraud, despite the strict policy of large marketplaces which aims to protect the rights of consumers, from the purchase of cheaper goods instead of the ordered expensive, or from cases of disappearance of the seller with other people’s money.  ▫️Cheat ratings and reviews complicate the process of choosing really good seller who would sell a product of good quality.  ▫️High commissions, which entrepreneurs are forced to pay, who want to sell their goods using marketplaces. This disadvantage has a direct impact on users, because sellers significantly increase the value of the goods, that is why buyers often heavily overpay for it.  ▫️Ineffective technical support, which, in case of any problems, regardless of the nature of their occurrence, may not respond to the application for weeks, resulting in the problem is solved too late or not solved at all.  ▫️”Tough” policy of the administration towards sellers. Minimum violations of the terms of use may lead to the blocking of accounts and the complete loss of the established client base. Administration of modern marketplaces do not take into account the objective arguments of all parties in order to sort out a situation.  Creating BUZAR platform we want to solve these problems and make a transparent, high-quality service!  Source: https://medium.com/@buzcoin/problems-of-the-modern-marketplace-de6413654062

The popularization of bitcoin and altcoin provoked the appearance of hundreds of different ICO projects.  Translating everything into simple language, ICO is a fundraising for the implementation of any project by a third-party company or team.  Today it is a new form of investment. Most often, it is not difficult to” recognize “ICO”, the main features are the connection with the blockchain technology, the use of any crypto — currencies and the issue of tokens. Experts make such conclusions on the basis of the policy analysis of some States, which intend to take the rapid development of the ICO under control.  Nevertheless, every day hundreds of teams announce the beginning of crowdsale, pre-sale, pre-ico (the values are equivalent to the beginning of fundraising).  https://buzcoin.io  source: https://medium.com/@buzcoin/what-is-ico-159dffd42a98

Body: Recently Bitcoin has been a topic for hot discussions…  It is growing, then, on the contrary, its rate drops sharply…  As you know, only 21 million bitcoins is available for mining. But what will happen when the last bitcoin is mined?  By the way, the last coin will be produced around 2140. Does this mean that all people wil burn their farms and go to spend money on intergalactic yachts — it is unknown.  But, it is possible that bitcoin like any other currency will be divided into smaller units — Satoshi. And Satoshi can become a trading unit, and bitcoin will be used only for large payments.  And, today a commission of 10 thousand Satoshi may sound unrealistic and seems unprofitable and meaningless, but in the future it may change.  But perhaps you have other assumptions about what will happen next after 2140 with bitcoin…  https://buzcoin.io  https://s5.wampi.ru/2018/05/21/30.md.jpg

Body: We would like to remind you! The test sale of the project BUZAR & BUZCOIN has completed! Author: buzcoin.io
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: Why Can't US Citizens Participate in Cryptocurrency ICOs?  US citizens cannot acquire tokens, although this country is considered the most desirable in terms of ICO and crypto-currency business.  Why so? Let's try to figure it out together. First of all, let's assess the background in the states at the moment. Companies that have opened representative offices in the US for ICO and token release, have to register another company in those jurisdictions where such activities are approved, or this issue has not been settled by the time of the token sale.  Another matter is also that the stock market and securities legislation limited the participation of residents and citizens of the United States in token-seals. In July 2017, representatives of the SEC reported that the tokens could be recognized as securities if certain conditions were met.  For example, a give a share in the company, vote right, profit promise, etc. Whether a token classifies as security determines by Howey Test, Capital Risk Test, Family Resemblance Test and other tests. In addition, the SEC prepared documents designed to warn future investors about risk with participation in the ICO.  All this applies to various ICO projects around the world, because they have to limit the participation of US citizens. Therefore, US projects are forced to opt for other jurisdictions for token sale in order not to complicate the lives of investors and themselves.  To sum up, a conclusion can be made that the development of ICO in the States is rather vague, at least at the start. Most likely, companies, having a head office in the US, will continue to sale tokens through more loyal jurisdictions.  https://buzcoin.io  https://s5.wampi.ru/2018/05/16/22-2.md.jpg

Author: buzcoin.io
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: Yesterday - Bitcoin, tomorrow - BUZCOIN  BUZCOIN offers a solution in the format of «All-in-one» to the market  «All-in-one» by BUZCOIN   The developers of the project BUZCOIN declare the establishment of a comprehensive platform that combines the functionality of instant messenger, social networking, super-marketplace and much more.   On the one hand, the rapid growth of IT-technologies has made our life much easier and more convenient than even 10 years ago, on the other – has complicated it.  Paradox? Not at all. Let's look at the screen of your smartphone and say how many messengers are installed in it? Three, four, or all five?  What about social media? Today, it is the order of the day to have several active accounts for the simple reason that one social network is more convenient to communicate with friends, the other one - with colleagues, the third one has a lot of interesting content and the fourth – free games and so on.  As a result, we need to operate 15 – 20 applications several times a day.  Some time ago smartphones  made a rapid revolution in the mobile market due to the fact that they offered an innovative technology "All-in-one". Conservative users, of course, said that the quality of the photos of the smartphone and of any digital camera didn’t go into any comparison, that the size of the screen of smartphones didn't allow full use of the Internet and text editors, etc.We are all well aware of the finale of this story.  Digital cameras are popular only among enthusiasts and professionals. Smartphone screens have reached such a size that no one remembers about tablets, and the power characteristics and functionality of mobile devices today are at such a level that they are able to solve a variety of problems, doing great even without desktop computers, and without laptops.  The unique Russian IT-project BUZCOIN is preparing for exactly the same revolution. BUZCOIN project combines two the most popular destinations among users.  The first is  BUZAR p2p communication platform, where the holders of BUZCOIN tokens will be able to use both the messenger and the social network. Even at the stage of development the platform included a functionality that allowed to share photos, videos and audio files, use video hosting and music service, where it was possible not only to listen to music but download the songs of popular authors, post your own works on the platform on a reimbursable basis, receiving remuneration from BUZAR.  The second part of the project BUZCOIN is a universal super-marketplace of goods and services. The developers say that users will have access to services for the purchase and sale of goods, Bulletin Board, services for rental and sale of real estate, job search, etc.  Thus, BUZCOIN offers the market a functionality which is interesting both for ordinary users and for representatives of the business community. Within the framework of the P2P platform BUZAR will the unit more than 20 different functions, for the use of which nowadays it is necessary to download a separate application for each of the functions. The developers of BUZCOIN project suggest not to do this, and press just one button.  It is interesting that now the creators of the project BUZCOIN declare that the stated functionality in any case will not be final. In the team's plans is to create a completely new web site where everyone will be able to find everything, which means an infinite extension of the platform’s functionality.  The decision on which next task to start working first of all will be taken on the basis of a special vote, in which anyone can offer the project new functions, express their views about the features of the project and contribute to the development of the global platform of the new generation.  https://buzcoin.io  https://s5.wampi.ru/2018/05/14/22-1.md.jpg

Author: buzcoin.io
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: Interesting fact!  Do you know that according to the research of Chainalysis (the company that deals with the study of blockchain) for the entire period of bitcoin existence (almost 10 years) about 3 million units (20%) of this currency have disappeared in the world?  In order to analyze the market of bitcoins Chainalysis divided all the existing bitcoins into categories: "original currency", "mined currency", "transactional currency", "currency of strategic investors," "ones withdrawn from circulation".  The smallest losses of bitcoins were found in the categories of "transactional currency" (spent or transferred to other bitcoin accounts over the past year) and "currency of strategic investors" (bitcoins held by owners for 1-2 years).  The biggest losses are observed in the category "withdrawn from circulation" (mined 2-7 years ago by the first enthusiasts) – about 30% of the total number of lost bitcoins.  The fact that real money can be burnt and gold bars-lost is well-known and self-evident.  However, the fact that digital money can be lost in the same way is impossible to guess.  It is expected that by 2040 people from all over the world will mine 21 million of bitcoins. However in fact, taking into account all the losses there will be much less cryptocurrency for exchange and trade.  https://buzcoin.io  https://s5.wampi.ru/2018/05/13/1949ab2e67c99d395d.md.jpg

Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: Bitcoin Banknotes Now Available in Singapore  These bitcoin banknotes were sold by Tangem company and are rather called“smart-banknotes”. They are not really made of paper; they are hardware storage units with a S3D350A chip manufactured by Samsung.  What they have in common with banknotes is that they represent one set value and can be physically given as payment at an outlet. In essence, these notes are self-contained wallets with their own private key.  Tangem refers to them as “uncopiable cold wallet(s)”.  According to a Tangem, the chip technology is tamper-proof, addressing “all known attack vectors on hardware and software levels.” It says that years of chip development via credit cards, SIM cards, and ID cards have led to a product secure enough that “cost of hacking a single banknote [is] uneconomical”.  The notes have an advantage over online transactions because payment is instant and does not incur a fee. The disadvantages to be fixed are security, distance, and convenience.  Banknotes are available for purchase now in denominations of 0.01 and 0.05 BTC.  https://buzcoin.io  https://s1.wampi.ru/2018/05/10/16-1.md.jpg

Author: voltesbit777
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: The financial crises of 2008–2014 showed how unstable, ruthless and unfair the world of fiat money is. However, crises are not simply the times of losses and hardships, they can also give an opportunity for something new to be created. Arguably, one of the largest consequences of the 2008 Crisis for the world economy was the creation of cryptocurrencies (the first issue of Bitcoin was on the 3rd of January 2009). And now we can witness a cryptocurrency revolution and a sharp rise of ICOs.   Nowadays it is simply unreasonable to deny the role and the importance of digital assets in the world economy. It attracts hundreds of billions of dollars of investments, with international experts in marketing and IT working in the industry. Moreover, most of these enthusiasts are Russian or Russian-born. However, the vast majority of their projects take place abroad.   The BUZCOIN team strongly disagrees with this phrasing of the question. We want to subvert the existing system and attract large foreign investors by creating the first Russian public blockchain start-up.   The new direction and the future of the Russian economy   The creation of innovative technologies is a fundamental part of a country’s stable development. Vladimir Putin stated the following regarding the need for innovation during the XI Dean Union Congress:  - Russia needs a technological breakthrough. If we fail to achieve it then we will fall behind — hopelessly fall behind in our development, with major negative consequences for both the economy and the society. The current developments will allow us to feel safe only in the next 20–30 years. However, this is not enough. We should look beyond the horizon.   Symbolically, this speech took place immediately after the token sale and right before the BUZCOIN’S presentation at the Crypto Lady conference.   If the importance of a technological breakthrough is being discussed on the highest level, then BUZCOIN was created in the right place, at the right time. Olga Buzova managed to create a team consisting of professionals with vast experience in ICO technologies. This, as well as Olga’s media talents, is the reason why we believe in the success of the project in Russia and beyond.

Symbolically, this speech took place immediately after the token sale and right before the BUZCOIN’S presentation at the Crypto Lady conference.   If the importance of a technological breakthrough is being discussed on the highest level, then BUZCOIN was created in the right place, at the right time. Olga Buzova managed to create a team consisting of professionals with vast experience in ICO technologies. This, as well as Olga’s media talents, is the reason why we believe in the success of the project in Russia and beyond.   What is BUZCOIN?   BUZCOIN consists of the BUZAR platform and BUZ tokens. The platform combines features of a marketplace that integrates cryptocurrencies in any business, a messenger, as well as a system recording the transaction data in blockchain. The system that is based on the use of smart contracts removes the human factor and even the slightest possibility of corruption in the payment system.   Tokens are needed to create a closed payment system with the highest level of transparency, security and transaction speed without the use of processing centres, intermediaries and with minimal fees. Blockchain technology allows all participants to carry out an online audit of all transactions, with all users’ personal data being kept secret.   Olga Buzova is not a technical specialist. However, it is unreasonable to question her marketing capabilities given the fact that she has nearly 13 million Instagram followers. Popularising BUZ tokens should be a walk in the park to her.   We are open to any offers and partnerships. We are looking for likeminded people, who are willing to participate in an attempt to create the largest blockchain IT project.  Join our community! Together we can achieve more!  https://buzcoin.io

Author: buzcoin.io
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: BUZAR – a viable substitute for Facebook  The founder and coordinator of the BUZCOIN project, Andrey Semin took part in a round-table meeting dedicated to the consequences of banning Telegram and the potential ban of Facebook on the Russian Internet.  Today the Parliamentary Newspaper pressroom saw a round-table meeting on one of the hottest topics on social media and beyond that is the consequences of banning Telegram and Facebook on the Russian Internet.  The round-table meeting took place with the participation of an LDPR party State Duma deputy Vasily Vlasov as well as representatives of Youth Parliament under the State Duma along with academic community.  The main issues put up for discussion were, obviously, the consequences of banning Telegram for business community and ordinary people, the effectiveness of banning social media in the war on terrorism and using social media bans as a response to Western sanction policies.  The general sentiment among the round-table participants turned out to be on the less pleasant side for the Russian authorities and the federal watchdog agency – Roskomnadzor – in particular, considering it has been attempting to ban the messenger for weeks to no avail.  You can create restrictions on the legal level, but in case with Russia the harshness of these bans is inversely related to their observation.  Even if the ban turns out to be effective, at this point of IT development there is no problem in creating a new service that would be similar to the banned one, within a matter of weeks.  In his turn, the founder and coordinator of the BUZCOIN project, Andrey Semin,  not having any claims against the developers of either Telegram or Facebook or their respective products, has expressed his concerns about the lack of Russian software products, messengers and social media.  He believes that the new Russian P2P communication platform called BUZAR whose launch is just around the corner, and if it doesn’t become a 100% substitute for Facebook, it will be able to cover most needs of the target audience as well as fully comply with the Russian legislation in terms of data processing and user data storage.  https://buzcoin.io

Author: buzcoin.io
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: Real success stories: crypto-millionaires-who are they?  Blockchain, cryptocurrencies, bitcoin – probably there is no one who hasn't heard these words. The new technology, the new digital economy, and the new ways to make money made a lot of noise... and gave the world a whole galaxy of rich people of a new type - the crypto-millionaire.  TOP 3 crypto-business  1️⃣ Brothers Cameron and Tyler Winklevoss. $10 billion. Today they are probably the most famous crypto-rich people in the world. And even besides the fact that they are twins, which significantly distinguishes them from the crowd. However, for the first time they became known not as crypto investors, but as those who accused Mark Zuckerberg of plagiarizing the ideas of the social network Facebook. They even sued him in court.  We can say that the brothers won the case-Zuckerberg went to a settlement agreement and paid the twins $ 65 million, although they themselves are accused of”patent trolling." This is when for large corporations it is easier to pay off the annoying plaintiffs with relatively small amounts than to work several years in a litigation - any conflict is bad for the price of shares.   With this amount Winklevoss started their crypto journey. They spent about $ 11 million from Zuckerberg's payments for the purchase of bitcoins. Since then the first digital currency was cheap, they bought it a lot. As a result, 5 years later, they became the first publicly known crypto-billionaires in the world. Their investment in bitcoin is up more than 31 000%! Alas, no one has managed to repeat their success. At least not in public.  2️⃣ Roger Ver. $2.7 billion. One of the first large investors who started working with cryptocurrencies. During his stormy activities to popularize the crypto industry he even received the nickname "Bitcoin Jesus".  According to various estimates he owned about 300 thousand bitcoins. Today, he actively promotes another currency – Bitcoin Cash and even made statements that he sold out all his bitcoins.   Is it really difficult to say, although the idea to fix the profit in December 2017 with the price of bitcoin of $20 thousand looks quite reasonable. We analyzed his fortune based on the fact that Ver still keep bitcoins with him or has bought a similar amount of Bitcoin Cash.  3️⃣ Tim Draper. $270 million. Tim Draper is a well-known venture investor and founder of Draper Fisher Jurvetson. Despite the fact that his crypto-capital is noticeably less than a billion, he is on our list. Why? Because he has $ 270 million only in bitcoins. And no one knows how many other cryptocurrencies he has managed to buy in recent years.   In 2014, he purchased at an auction of U.S. marshals about 30,000 bitcoins from the number of cryptocurrency withdrawn from the wallets of the semi-criminal platform Silk road.  Tim Draper is still optimistic about the future of cryptocurrency. Recently, he said that the emergence of cryptocurrencies is more important than the creation of the Internet and the industrial revolution. And even gave a forecast of growth of bitcoin to $50 thousand by the end of 2018. It is not clear whether this forecast comes true, but we can say that he is not going to get rid of his cryprocurency.  All these billionaires are either experienced investors and businessmen, or those who stood at the origins of the crypto industry and managed to see great prospects in it. That is, people who already had considerable capital before entering the crypto world.  What about” mere mortals " like you and me? Is there a chance for an ordinary person to get their benefits from cryptocurrencies?  Our answer - of course Yes! Cryptocurrency can radically change the life of each participant.  https://buzcoin.io

Fang – the foundress of the Bitkan platform for traders and investors. The face of the Asian crypto industry is especially popular in China. Y Fang actively participates in the development of the branch, organizing various conferences and actions;  2️⃣Priti Kasiridi – one of the most known IT developer in the sphere of financial technologies. She cooperated with such companies as Goldman Sachs, Andreessen Horowitz and Coinbase. The girl actively shares the knowledge about the work of the blockchain technology, cryptocurrencies and how to work with them;  3️⃣Trisha Martinez – the founder and the CEO of the Wala company, the creator of the mobile financial platform of the same name and a Dala token. She specializes in providing financial services. Actively shares the knowledge with readers on Twitter.  As we see, girls in this branch create cryptocurrencies quite effectively, start platforms and develop crypto industry, moving it to new heights.  Do you want to be among them and to learn to earn on cryptocurrencies?  Come to the Crypto Lady conference which general partner is BUZCOIN from Olga Buzova! Body: Online shopping: which of world brands already accepts cryptocurrency?  Despite the ambiguous relation to cryptocurrencies, they are even more often used for payment of goods and services every year.  We propose you Top-5 world companies which already accept payment in Bitcoin and other popular cryptocurrencies:  1️⃣Overstock.com – one of the largest online companies and shops of retail trade;  2️⃣EGifter – a mobile application, popular in the world, by means of which it is possible to make out gift cards for purchases at Amazon, Sephora, Home Depot and Kohl;  3️⃣Newegg – one of the retail sellers of the equipment, most popular in the world;  4️⃣Microsoft - for cryptocurrency it is possible to buy games, movies and applications in Windows and Xbox shops.  5️⃣Expedia - the largest agency for booking online travel in the world. By means of digital money the agency allows to book rooms in hotels in various countries.  With the growth of understanding the advantages of cryptocurrencies, the number of the companies accepting them will also grow.  Our BUZCOIN project works both on promoting of digital money and the blockchain, and on the creation of the super marketplace for the organic introduction of technologies in the Russian and world business.  Does your business need new clients and audience? If yes, join BUZAR community from Olga Buzova right now!  https://buzcoin.io

Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: Dear project participants!  Please, don’t use the Cryptonator wallet when purchasing BUZCOIN tokens!  When you pay for tokens in Ethereum (ETH) to our project’s smart contract, it sends tokens back to the paying wallet automatically, and in case of Cryptonator, the address belongs not to you, but the wallet provider, so your tokens end up in their possession. You will not be able to receive BUZCOIN using that wallet.  We would also like to draw your attention to the fact that you shouldn’t transfer money from exchanges to our project’s smart contract – you will not be able to obtain the purchased tokens as they will end up on the exchange address that you used to pay for BUZCOIN!  ✅ Please use a personal wallet that supports ERC20 Ethereum tokens such as MyEtherWallet, Mist, Metamask, Parity.  🚫 Do NOT send ETH from Exchange, Poloniex, Coinbase, Bitfinex, Bittrex, Cex.io, Jaxx, Cryptonator, Exodus, Kraken, Bitstamp and any other hosted wallets or exchanges.  https://buzcoin.io

Author: buzcoin.io
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: Russia will launch a cryptocurrency for the BRICS countries?  We all know that Russia can legalize cryptocurrency this summer, after the adoption of the relevant bill. Therefore, it is even more interesting to read the statement of Olga Skorobogatova, the first Deputy of the Central Bank of the Russian Federation for RIA "Novosti". And she said that the BRICS countries (Russia, China, Brazil, India and South Africa) will soon be able to issue their own cryptocurrency - the discussion is already underway.   She noted that in 2018 the Bank of Russia intends to start negotiations with the EAEU and BRICS on the introduction of the common digital currency into the financial market. So we can say that Russia, as a state, has recognized the advantages of blockchain and cryptocurrencies, and intends to promote them in the international arena!   And now our task with you-not to miss the chance and to enter the cryptoworld in time. Olga Buzova together with BUZCOIN project will help you in your quest to keep pace with the times.   Read more about the project BUZCOIN, the most promising Russian blockchain startup, visit the website buzcoin.io.  https://buzcoin.io

Author: buzcoin.io
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: What is an "app- in- app" and why does BUZAR need this feature?  We have already said and even written that BUZAR will implement the model "application in application", which will then allow hundreds and thousands of companies and applications to integrate into the work of BUZAR through an open API and access to a common client base. The user will be available to have access to all kinds of products, services and communication.  People will be able to make video and audio calls, exchange messages and files through encrypted channels, place ads on the sale of their goods or services, order a taxi or food with home delivery, play online games or read books, search for work or real estate, create their own online stores, make group purchases, transfer BUZCOIN cryptocurrency to other platform participants and much more!  Thus, any user will be able to simply and effectively promote their products through BUZAR platform, be it an international consortium or simple plumbing services in a small city, and on the other hand, will become the new gold standard of social service in the world, which will be able to satisfy absolutely any user requests.  https://buzcoin.io

Author: buzcoin.io
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: Investor’s diary What is blockchain technology?  Blockchain is a database that stores a constantly growing list of records (blocks). These records are organized in a strict sequence, and each subsequent record stores some information about the previous record. Such a database is stored on users ‘ computers (it does not have a single server) and everyone who keeps the database has its full copy and new records are added to all existing copies.  Is it clear? Let’s explain with a simple example:  Sasha bought 6 apples Record this fact in the blockchain (some diary) and get block number 1. Send block №1 to Kolya, Vita, Sveta, Snezhana and Margarita (network users) — now all they know that Sasha has 6 apples.  Sasha gives Kolya 5 apples to divide them between his friends. Write down this fact in block number 2. Block 2 contains the unique identifier of block 1. Send this block to Vite, Sveta, Snezhana and Margarita.  Kolya gives Vita 1 Apple.  Write this down in block #3. Add a unique identifier of block 2 . We send a block to all users.  Kolya gives Sveta 3 apples to share with her friends. Record in the block number 4. Add the identifier of the block № 3. Send out a block.  Sveta, instead of treating her friends, eats all 3 apples in a fit of hunger during the night, and when Snezhana and Margarita come to her for the promised apples (because they received information that Kolya gave Sveta three apples), Sveta is trying to put the blame on Kolya and says that he gave her only 1 apple, and the rest he kept for himself. But the entry in the blockchain tells a different story and Snezhans wit Margarita know that Sveta has eaten their fruits!  Thus, the blockchain is there to protect us from fraud within the network, making the transaction very easy and transparent!  https://buzcoin.io/

Author: buzcoin.io
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: If you are interested in cryptocurrencies and blockchain, then you have probably met with such a concept as smart contract. Let us talk a little bit about this.  Thus, a smart contract is an electronic algorithm or a condition under which the parties can exchange money, shares and other assets. To implement a smart contract you need to have a decentralized network where all participants have equal rights.  How it works – let's explain by example.  Have you already bought the property?  If so, you probably know that it is necessary to apply to the notary to make a deal, and it is always an additional cost for the buyer. Smart contracts allow you to get rid of intermediaries (banks, lawyers, notaries, etc.), because they independently verify the terms of the transaction and confirm it.  The asset or currency is transferred to the program. After that, it begins to monitor the implementation of the contract. Once the conditions are considered fulfilled, the parties exchange assets. The seller receives a fixed amount and the buyer passes the goods. In other words, everything happens automatically.  It is the Ethereum smart contracts in our project that guarantees transparent operation, security of transactions in the B2C, C2C and B2B segments. This allows us to exclude the possibility of a human factor, and hence any deception.  🖥 https://buzcoin.io

Author: buzcoin.io
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: BUZcoin without mining: how is it possible?  First, let's understand what is mining. Mining is the process by which transactions are verified and added to the public ledger, known as the blockchain, and also the means through which new cryptocurrency is released.  While computers carry out payload for users, owners of the technics receive the share and earn. In fact, these are computing powers, which ensure the functioning of all cryptocurrency payment service providers.  If  it is impossible to start the cryptocurrency without computing power, then how our BUZAR platform will work? We do not have miners. Everything is very simple! At this stage, the Ethereum network, on the basis of which the platform of version 1.0 will be started, gives us necessary computing power.  It is reached through the integration of tokens of the ERC20 standard, which also have many advantages. Such as an ensuring stable work of smart contracts, the safety of transactions, transparency of transactions, liquidity based on demand, but not at the will of pools of miners, etc.  Such approach allows us to make really decentralized and reliable system for creation of a universal marketplace and other global services!  https://buzcoin.io

Body: 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132 How it all began  10  YEARS AGO 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334  When in 2004 she became a participant, and soon the leading reality show DOM2 - one of the most popular among Russian youth.  Olga understands that we live in the era of the Internet and digitalization and therefore decided to create a platform that will combine several simple and important functions for people using modern technology blockchain and cryptocurrency.  Having invited to her team real professionals who have already worked with blockchain projects, Olga decided to create a project - BUZAR and release her own cryptocurrency BUZCOIN.    1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132   Bit of history   A bazar is a marketplace where goods and services are exchanged or sold. 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334 The term originates from the Persian word bāzār. Although the current meaning of the word is believed to have originated in Persia, its use has spread and has been accepted into the vernacular in countries around the world.  Evidence for the existence of bazars dates to around 3,000 BCE. Bazars initially developed outside city walls where they were often associated with servicing the needs of caravanserai. As towns and cities became more populous, these bazars moved into the city center and developed in a linear pattern along streets stretching from one city gate to another gate on the opposite side of the city.  Over time, these bazars formed a network of trading centres which allowed for the exchange of produce and information.    12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334 Buzar is a new online platform where any Internet user can find the most important thing he is looking for in the network: a boyfriend or a girlfriend, arrange a private life, make new acquaintances, find old friends, business partners and associates, get away from loneliness, which is so much in the modern world. 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132 On the other hand, we will create a universal trading platform where everyone will be able to exchange values, buy something, bypassing intermediaries, or on the contrary to sell something urgently.     12345678910111213141  Social network 12345678910111213141  Messenger 12345678910111213141  Video 12345678910111213141  App in app 12345678910111213141  Events 12345678910111213  Music service Messaging, calls and video calls over encrypted channels Hosting and video broadcasting Direct user access to the services of hundreds of companies and applications through the BUZAR Purchase tickets for concerts and other events    1234567891011121314  Bulletin Board and online auction 1234567891011121314  Purchase & sale of goods and services 1234567891011121314  Job service 1234567891011121314  Real estate 1234567891011121314  Creation of online stores 12345678910111213  Cryptocurrency exchange service and p2p payments with guarantee of transactions security through smart contracts technology Publication of vacancies and job search service Service for rental and sale of real estate This function will be introduced after the appropriate license is received.        1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132 April 2018. Author: buzcoin.io
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: 💙 Bitcointalk is the oldest and largest online forum dedicated to blockchain technology and cryptocurrencies.  The site appeared on the Internet in 2009 when the price of Bitcoin was only one tenth of a cent. Since then, the price of the most well-known bitcoin has grown approximately about 10 million times and today is $8 085,59  ▫️Bitcointalk was originally created by Satoshi Nakamoto – a "father" of bitcoin, a person whose true identity is unknown (maybe it's not one person but a certain group of people communicating under one pseudonym). By the way, Satoshi's profile on Bitcointalk can be found today - the last time he went to his account was on the 13 of December 2010 (link to his profile https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3 )  ▫️One of Satoshi's last posts before he end up disappeared, there was a post regarding WikiLeaks in which Satoshi claimed that "WikiLeaks has squashed the hornet's nest and now the swarm is heading towards us." According to the forum, now the site has more than 1.7 million users, who have written a total of about 29.5 million messages'. Since the creation of Bitcointalk, the content on the site has received several billion page views. An average of 403 new users are logged in every day, and the current ratio of men to women is 4:1.  ▫️Bitcointalk.org was built with the use of the software package of an open source software called SMF. The design and functionality of the forum have not changed since its first publication.  ▫️The branch "Altcoin Ads" today is the most popular section on Bitcointalk and then go the "Bitcoin discussions" sections and "Altcon debate."  ▫️"Altcoin Ads" has become especially popular in 2017 due to the ever increasing number of ICO and sales of tokens, which are held every week! Just a few days ago, a branch of BUZCOIN appeared on the forum https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=3333064.msg34852385#msg34852385 and we will be very happy to see all our subscribers in our section on Bitcointalk and invite you to express your opinion and ask questions.   https://buzcoin.io

Author: buzcoin.io
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: Investor dictionary: what is ICO?  ▫️We are well aware that many of the participants of our chat for the first time have faced with words such as "blockchain", "token" cryptocurrency"," ICO"," DAO "...   ▫️We want our readers to know what is hidden behind them, and therefore we will write " investor's dictionary", in which we will tell you what cryptocurrency is, what the fashionable word" HYPE "means today and how DAO differs from ICO. And we are starting with the very beginning!  ▫️The abbreviation of ICO stands for Initial Coin Offering which means "initial placement of the token" (the token in this case is a cryptocurrency). The purpose of any ICO is to attract investment, and collecting funds for its project, its author always acquires certain obligations to investors.   https://buzcoin.io

Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] BUZCOIN - Messenger & Marketplace from Russian Star
Body: We have already said that BUZAR platform is a unique product  Later we will tell you in detail about all the features of our application (if you can't wait – read the White Paper https://buzcoin.io/WP_BUZAR-ENG.pdf?2018-04-18 and ask questions in chat).   Today we will talk about what functionality BUZAR platform will have:   Social network. Users of the network will be able to create communities and groups, personal and public pages, find new friends, partners and share notes and impressions.   Instant messenger. Text messaging, calls and video calls. It will also be possible to send private messages through encrypted channels. The possibility of anonymous exchange of messages, calls and video calls over encrypted channels will be implemented.   Implementing the app-in-app model: users will have access to the services of hundreds of companies and apps through BUZAR.   Data transfer: you can send files, photos and documents to your friends and partners. And still it will be possible to place video content and to carry out stream!   Music service. Users of the platform will store, reproduce, and publicly distribute audio files, and performers and copyright owners will post their content and receive a fee for its use.   Events. Purchase tickets for concerts and other events.  In addition to everything – simple and intuitive interface and the ability to quickly access any application or function you need.   https://buzcoin.io
